#' Generating random distance for [h_get_distance()] helper function
2 
#'
3 
#' A helper function for [h_get_distance()] by first calculating non-overlapping
4 
#' distance between looks if looks are of minimum length of 2 elements.
5 
#'
6 
#' @typed nn : number or numeric
7 
#'  the union of `nnE` and `nnF`, if futility analysis or looks are supplied.
8 
#'
9 
#' @return A number providing the wiggle distance.
10 
#'
11 
#' @keywords internal
12 
#'
13 
h_dist0 <- function(nn) {
14 2081x 
  assert_numeric(nn, lower = 1, unique = TRUE, sorted = TRUE, min.len = 2)
15 2079x 
  ceiling(min(nn - c(0, nn[-length(nn)])) / 2) - 1
16 
}
17 

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' Generating random distance in given looks for sample sizes for Efficacy and Futility.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function for [ocPostprob()] to generate random distance's wiggle room around looks `nn`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_dist0

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A numeric with `length(nn)-1` elements.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
h_get_distance <- function(nn) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    2074x
                    
                      
  dist0 <- h_dist0(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    2072x
                    
                      
  sample(-dist0:dist0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    2072x
                    
                      
    size = length(nn) - 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    2072x
                    
                      
    replace = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    2072x
                    
                      
    prob = 2^(-abs(-dist0:dist0) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' Generating looks from random distance

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function for [ocPostprob()] that applies the numeric element of `dist` to looks `nn`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed dist : numeric or logical

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'  distance for random looks around the look locations in `nn`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'  where `dist` is generated from [h_get_distance()] in a numeric of at least one element.

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'  If `NULL`, only one location look will be set at `nnE` or `nnF`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed nnE : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'  sample size or sizes where study can be stopped for Efficacy decision. If different for Futility decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'  specify in `nnF`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed nnF : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'  sample size or sizes where study can be stopped for Futility decision if different from Efficacy decision.

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Uses distance from [h_get_distance()] to add to looks, creating wiggled looks:

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `nnrE` is the result for Efficacy looks with random distance added.

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `nnrF` is the result for Futility looks with random distance added.

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
h_get_looks <- function(dist, nnE, nnF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    2073x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(dist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    2073x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    2073x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    2073x
                    
                      
  nn <- sort(unique(c(nnE, nnF)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    2073x
                    
                      
  nnr <- nn + c(dist, 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    2073x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    2073x
                    
                      
    nnrE = nnr[nn %in% nnE],

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    2073x
                    
                      
    nnrF = nnr[nn %in% nnF]

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' Generating random decision and sample size looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function for [ocPostprob()] to generate numeric of decisions `decisions` and random looks `all_sizes`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed nnr : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'  union of `nnE`and `nnF`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed truep : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#'  assumed true response rate.

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed p0 : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#'  lower Futility threshold of response rate.

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed p1 : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#'  upper Efficacy threshold of response rate.

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed tL : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#'  posterior probability threshold for being below `p0`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed tU : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#'  posterior probability threshold for being above `p1`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed parE : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#'  alpha and beta parameters for the prior on the treatment population.

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#'  Default set at alpha = 1, beta = 1, or uniform prior.

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed orig_nnr : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#'  unique values of original, user-input values of `nnE` and `nnF`, defined by user-facing

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#'  function and aid to `plotOc()`'s x axis input when `wiggle = TRUE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements :

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `decision` : decision `flag` with `TRUE` for Go, `FALSE` for Stop, `NA` for Gray zone.

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `all_sizes` : resulting number of look size, anything below maximum

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#'   look size is an indicated interim, Futility or Efficacy or both.

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
h_get_decision <- function(nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
                           truep,

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
                           p0, p1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
                           parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
                           nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
                           nnF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
                           tL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
                           tU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
                           orig_nnr) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    100201x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    100201x
                    
                      
  assert_number(truep, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    100201x
                    
                      
  assert_number(p0, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    100201x
                    
                      
  assert_number(p1, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    100201x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parE, min.len = 2, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    100201x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnE, lower = 1, any.missing = FALSE, sorted = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    100201x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnF, lower = 1, any.missing = FALSE, sorted = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    100201x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tL, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    100201x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tU, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    100201x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(orig_nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    100201x
                    
                      
  Nmax <- max(nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    100201x
                    
                      
  index_look <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    100201x
                    
                      
  size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    100201x
                    
                      
  all_sizes <- decision <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    100201x
                    
                      
  response <- stats::rbinom(Nmax, size = 1, prob = truep)

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    100201x
                    
                      
  while (is.na(decision) && index_look <= length(nnr)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    127792x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    118631x
                    
                      
      qL <- 1 - postprob(x = sum(response[1:size_look]), n = size_look, p = p0, parE = parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    118631x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(qL >= tL, FALSE, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    118631x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    127792x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    127792x
                    
                      
      qU <- postprob(x = sum(response[1:size_look]), n = size_look, p = p1, parE = parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    127792x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(qU < tU, decision, TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    127792x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    127792x
                    
                      
    all_sizes <- size_look

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    127792x
                    
                      
    index_look <- index_look + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    127792x
                    
                      
    size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    100201x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    100201x
                    
                      
    decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    100201x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    100201x
                    
                      
    all_looks = all_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' Creating list for operating characteristics

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' Generates operating characteristics.

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed all_sizes : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#'  sample sizes of all looks simulated `length(sim)` times if `dist` applied.

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed decision : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#'  Go, Stop or Gray Zone decisions of all looks simulated `length(sim)` times.

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list of results containing :

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ExpectedN`: expected number of patients in the trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrStopEarly`: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyEff`: probability of Early Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyFut`: probability of for Early Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEfficacy`: probability of Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrFutility`: probability of Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrGrayZone`: probability between Go and Stop ,"Evaluate" or Gray decision zone

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
h_get_oc <- function(all_sizes, Nmax, decision) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    46x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(all_sizes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    46x
                    
                      
  assert_true(Nmax >= max(all_sizes))

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    46x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(Nmax, lower = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    46x
                    
                      
  assert_logical(decision, len = length(all_sizes))

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    46x
                    
                      
  sim <- length(all_sizes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    46x
                    
                      
  data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    46x
                    
                      
    ExpectedN = mean(all_sizes, na.rm = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    46x
                    
                      
    PrStopEarly = mean(all_sizes < Nmax, na.rm = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    46x
                    
                      
    PrEarlyEff = sum(decision * (all_sizes < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / sim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    46x
                    
                      
    PrEarlyFut = sum((1 - decision) * (all_sizes < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / sim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    46x
                    
                      
    PrEfficacy = sum(decision, na.rm = TRUE) / sim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    46x
                    
                      
    PrFutility = sum(1 - decision, na.rm = TRUE) / sim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    46x
                    
                      
    PrGrayZone = sum(is.na(decision)) / sim

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#' Operating Characteristics for Posterior Probability method

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate operating characteristics for posterior probability method.

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
#' It is assumed that the true response rate is `truep`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
#' The trial is stopped for Efficacy if the posterior probability to be

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
#' above `p1` is larger than `tU`, and stopped for Futility if the posterior

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#' probability to be below `p0` is larger than `tL`:

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
#' Stop criteria for Efficacy :

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
#' `Pr(RR > p1) > tU`

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
#' Stop criteria for Futility :

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
#' `Pr(RR < p0) > tL`

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
#' Resulting operating characteristics include the following:

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ExpectedN`: expected number of patients in the trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrStopEarly`: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyEff`: probability of Early Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyFut`: probability of for Early Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEfficacy`: probability of Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrFutility`: probability of Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrGrayZone`: probability between Go and Stop ,"Evaluate" or Gray decision zone

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed sim : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of simulations.

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed wiggle : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
#'  generate random look locations (not default).

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
#'  if `TRUE`, optional to specify `dist` (see @details).

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements:

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
#' - `oc`: matrix with operating characteristics (see @details section)

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
#' - `nn`: vector of look locations that was supplied

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
#' - `nnE`: vector of Efficacy look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
#' - `nnF`: vector of Futility look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
#' - `params`: user input arguments.

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      
#

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/ocPostprob.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
ocPostprob <- function(nnE, truep, p0, p1, tL, tU, parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
                       sim = 50000, wiggle = FALSE, nnF = nnE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    8x
                    
                      
  nn <- sort(unique(c(nnF, nnE)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    8x
                    
                      
  Nmax <- max(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    8x
                    
                      
  assert_number(sim, lower = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    8x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(wiggle)

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (sim < 50000) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    7x
                    
                      
    warning("Advise to use sim >= 50000 to achieve convergence")

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    8x
                    
                      
  decision <- vector(length = sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    8x
                    
                      
  all_sizes <- vector(length = sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    8x
                    
                      
  all_looks <- vector(length = sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    8x
                    
                      
  for (k in seq_len(sim)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    100200x
                    
                      
    if (length(nn) != 1 && wiggle) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    200x
                    
                      
      dist <- h_get_distance(nn = nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    200x
                    
                      
      nnr <- h_get_looks(dist = dist, nnE = nnE, nnF = nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    200x
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnr$nnrE

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    200x
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnr$nnrF

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    200x
                    
                      
      orig_nnE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    200x
                    
                      
      orig_nnF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    1e+05x
                    
                      
      dist <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    1e+05x
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    1e+05x
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    1e+05x
                    
                      
      orig_nnE <- nnrE

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    1e+05x
                    
                      
      orig_nnF <- nnrF

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    100200x
                    
                      
    nnr <- unique(c(nnrE, nnrF))

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    100200x
                    
                      
    orig_nnr <- unique(c(orig_nnE, orig_nnF))

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    100200x
                    
                      
    tmp <- h_get_decision(

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    100200x
                    
                      
      nnr = nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    100200x
                    
                      
      truep = truep,

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    100200x
                    
                      
      p0 = p0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    100200x
                    
                      
      p1 = p1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    100200x
                    
                      
      parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    100200x
                    
                      
      nnE = nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    100200x
                    
                      
      nnF = nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    100200x
                    
                      
      tL = tL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    100200x
                    
                      
      tU = tU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    100200x
                    
                      
      orig_nnr = orig_nnr

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    100200x
                    
                      
    decision[k] <- tmp$decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    100200x
                    
                      
    all_sizes[k] <- tmp$all_sizes

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    100200x
                    
                      
    all_looks[k] <- tmp$all_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    8x
                    
                      
  oc <- h_get_oc(all_sizes = all_sizes, Nmax = Nmax, decision = decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    8x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    8x
                    
                      
    oc = oc,

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    8x
                    
                      
    Decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    8x
                    
                      
    Looks = all_looks,

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    8x
                    
                      
    SampleSize = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    8x
                    
                      
    union_nn = nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    8x
                    
                      
    wiggled_nnrE = nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    8x
                    
                      
    wiggled_nnrF = nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    8x
                    
                      
    dist = dist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    8x
                    
                      
    params = as.list(match.call(expand.dots = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot the boundary decision cutpoints

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' This function will plot the response rate on the futility and efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' boundaries, and is used together with \code{\link{boundsPredprob}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' and \code{\link{boundsPostprob}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param z an output of \code{\link{boundsPredprob}} and

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{boundsPostprob}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param area color the futility/efficacy stop area

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param grid show the grid of y-axis or not

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param yt  indicate the y axis: response rate is "p", number of responses

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' is "x"

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param add  add the boundary lines or not

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cols specific the color of `[1]` efficacy area `[2]` futility area

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' `[3]` efficacy boundary `[4]` futility boundary

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lwds line width (a two dimensional vector)

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ltype line type

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lpch  a value of plotting characters or symbols

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lcex a value giving the amount by which plotting characters and

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' symbols should be scaled relative to the default.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @param gy a value to adjust the gray level of the plot (default 20),

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' applies when \code{grid==TRUE}

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @return nothing, only produces the plot as side effect

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom graphics lines abline polygon plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/plotBounds.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
plotBounds <- function(z, area = TRUE, grid = TRUE, yt = "x", add = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
                       cols = c("green", "red", "darkgreen", "orange"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
                       lwds = c(3, 3), ltype = "l", lpch = 16, lcex = 1, gy = 20) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    !
                    
                      
  n <- nrow(z)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    !
                    
                      
  nmin <- min(z$looks)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    !
                    
                      
  nmax <- max(z$looks)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
  if (yt == "x") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
    z1 <- z$xL

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
    z2 <- z$xU

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
    yU <- nmax

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    !
                    
                      
    yU2 <- nmin

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    !
                    
                      
    ylabel <- "Number of Responses"

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    !
                    
                      
    gridy <- seq(0, yU, by = floor(yU / gy))

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    !
                    
                      
  } else if (yt == "p") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
    z1 <- z$pL

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    !
                    
                      
    z2 <- z$pU

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    !
                    
                      
    yU <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    !
                    
                      
    yU2 <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
    ylabel <- "Response Rate"

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    !
                    
                      
    gridy <- seq(0, yU, by = yU / gy)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("yt can only be x or p")

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
  if (add) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::lines(z$looks, z2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[1], col = cols[3], type = ltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
      pch = lpch, cex = lcex

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::lines(z$looks, z1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[2], col = cols[4], type = ltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    !
                    
                      
      pch = lpch, cex = lcex

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
    return(invisible())

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::plot(z$looks, rep(0, n),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    !
                    
                      
    xlim = c(0, max(z$looks)), ylim = c(0, yU), type = "n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
    xlab = "n", ylab = ylabel

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
  if (grid) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::abline(h = gridy, col = "gray")

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
  if (area) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::polygon(c(z$looks, nmax, nmin), c(z2, yU, yU2),

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[1],

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
      col = cols[1], border = cols[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::polygon(c(z$looks, nmax, nmin), c(z1, 0, 0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[2],

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
      col = cols[2], border = cols[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::lines(z$looks, z2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[1], col = cols[1], type = ltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
      pch = lpch, cex = lcex

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::lines(z$looks, z1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
      lwd = lwds[2], col = cols[2], type = ltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
      pch = lpch, cex = lcex

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
  return(invisible())

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Generating random decision and sample size looks for `decision1 == TRUE` or default option

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function for [ocPredprob()] to generate numeric of decisions `decisions` and

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' random looks `all_sizes` for `decision1 == TRUE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed nnr : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'  union of `nnE` and `nnF`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed truep : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'  assumed true response rate or true rate (scenario).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed p0 : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'  lower Futility threshold of response rate.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed parE : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'  alpha and beta parameters for the prior on the treatment population.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'  Default set at alpha = 1, beta = 1, or uniform prior.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed nnE : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'  sample size or sizes where study can be stopped for Efficacy decision. If `0` or `NULL` and

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'  `length(nnE) = 1` then no Efficacy looks are performed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed nnF : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'  sample size or sizes where study can be stopped for Efficacy decision. If `0` or `NULL` and

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'  `length(nnF) = 1` then no Futility looks are performed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed tT : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'  threshold of which assumed `truep` exceeds acceptable threshold of `p0`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed phiU : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'  upper threshold on the predictive probability.

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed phiL : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'  lower threshold on the predictive probability.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements:

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `decision` : decision `flag` with `TRUE` for Go, `FALSE` for Stop, `NA` for Gray zone.

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `all_sizes` : resulting number of look size, anything below maximum

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   look size is an indicated interim, Futility or Efficacy or both.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
h_get_decision_one_predprob <- function(nnr, truep, p0, parE = c(1, 1), nnE, nnF, tT, phiU, phiL, orig_nnr) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    151x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnr, lower = 1, sorted = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    151x
                    
                      
  assert_number(truep, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    151x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnE, lower = 1, any.missing = FALSE, sorted = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    151x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnF, lower = 1, any.missing = FALSE, sorted = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    151x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tT, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    151x
                    
                      
  assert_number(phiU, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    151x
                    
                      
  assert_number(phiL, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    151x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(orig_nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    151x
                    
                      
  index_look <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    151x
                    
                      
  Nmax <- max(nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    151x
                    
                      
  decision <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    151x
