      xS = xS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    235x
                    
                      
      nS = nS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    235x
                    
                      
      delta = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    235x
                    
                      
      relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    235x
                    
                      
      parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    235x
                    
                      
      weights = weights, # for activeBetamixPost

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    235x
                    
                      
      parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    235x
                    
                      
      weightsS = weightsS # for controlBetamixPost

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    235x
                    
                      
    decision <- ifelse(final_fu_qU < tT, FALSE, decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    235x
                    
                      
    all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    301x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    301x
                    
                      
    decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    301x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = size_look,

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    301x
                    
                      
    all_looks = all_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#' Generating random decision and sample size looks for `decision1 == FALSE` or default option

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function for [ocPredprobDist()] to generate numeric of decisions `decisions` and

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#' random looks `all_sizes` for `decision1 == TRUE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decision_two_predprob

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_predprobdist

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_decision_one_predprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements:

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `decision` : decision `flag` with `TRUE` for Go, `FALSE` for Stop, `NA` for Gray zone.

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `all_sizes` : resulting number of look size, anything below maximum

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#'   look size is an indicated interim, Futility or Efficacy or both.

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
h_decision_two_predprobDist <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
    nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
    nnF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
    nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
    truep,

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
    xS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
    nS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
    parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
    parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
    tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
    tF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
    phiU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
    phiFu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
    deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
    deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
    weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
    weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
    relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
    orig_nnr) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    111x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnE, lower = 1, sorted = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE, )

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    111x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnF, lower = 1, sorted = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE, )

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    111x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnr, lower = 1, sorted = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE, )

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    111x
                    
                      
  assert_number(truep, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    111x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(orig_nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    111x
                    
                      
  index_look <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    111x
                    
                      
  Nmax <- max(nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    111x
                    
                      
  NmaxControl <- max(nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    111x
                    
                      
  decision <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    111x
                    
                      
  response <- stats::rbinom(Nmax, size = 1, prob = truep)

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
  # The criteria for Decision 2 for Interim looks are :

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
  # Interim GO : P ( successful at final) > phiU

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
  # Interim STOP : P ( unsuccessful at final ) > phiFu

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    111x
                    
                      
  while (is.na(decision) && index_look < length(nnr)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    127x
                    
                      
    size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    127x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    125x
                    
                      
      interim_qU <- predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    125x
                    
                      
        x = sum(response[1:size_look]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    125x
                    
                      
        n = size_look,

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    125x
                    
                      
        xS = xS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    125x
                    
                      
        nS = nS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    125x
                    
                      
        Nmax = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    125x
                    
                      
        NmaxControl = NmaxControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    125x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    125x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    125x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    125x
                    
                      
        weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    125x
                    
                      
        parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    125x
                    
                      
        weightsS = weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    125x
                    
                      
        thetaT = tT

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    125x
                    
                      
      )$result

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    125x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(interim_qU > phiU, FALSE, decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    125x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    127x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    116x
                    
                      
      interim_qU <- 1 - predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    116x
                    
                      
        x = sum(response[1:size_look]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    116x
                    
                      
        n = size_look,

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    116x
                    
                      
        xS = xS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    116x
                    
                      
        nS = nS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    116x
                    
                      
        Nmax = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    116x
                    
                      
        NmaxControl = NmaxControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    116x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    116x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    116x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    116x
                    
                      
        weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    116x
                    
                      
        parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    116x
                    
                      
        weightsS = weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    116x
                    
                      
        thetaT = tT

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    116x
                    
                      
      )$result

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    116x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(interim_qU > phiFu, FALSE, decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    116x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    127x
                    
                      
    index_look <- index_look + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
  # The criteria for Decision 2 for Futility looks are :

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
  # Final GO = P( RR > p0 + delta ) > tT

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
  # Final STOP = P( RR < p1 - delta ) > tF

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    111x
                    
                      
  if (is.na(decision)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    11x
                    
                      
    size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    11x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    11x
                    
                      
      final_eff_qU <- postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    11x
                    
                      
        x = sum(response[1:size_look]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    11x
                    
                      
        n = size_look,

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    11x
                    
                      
        xS = xS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    11x
                    
                      
        nS = nS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    11x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    11x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    11x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    11x
                    
                      
        parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    11x
                    
                      
    decision <- ifelse(final_eff_qU > tT, TRUE, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    11x
                    
                      
    all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    111x
                    
                      
  if (size_look %in% nnF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    102x
                    
                      
    final_fu_qU <- 1 - postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    102x
                    
                      
      x = sum(response[1:size_look]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    102x
                    
                      
      n = size_look,

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    102x
                    
                      
      xS = xS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    102x
                    
                      
      nS = nS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    102x
                    
                      
      delta = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    102x
                    
                      
      relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    102x
                    
                      
      parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    102x
                    
                      
      parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    102x
                    
                      
    decision <- ifelse(final_fu_qU > tF, FALSE, decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    102x
                    
                      
    all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    111x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    111x
                    
                      
    decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    111x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = size_look,

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    111x
                    
                      
    all_looks = all_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate operating characteristics for predictive probability method

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    
                    
                      
#' with beta prior on SOC response rate (gray zone allowed in the final analysis for Decision 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    
                    
                      
#' For formulas and expressions for predictive probability, refer to [predprobDist()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      
#' The rules for Stop, Go and Gray Zone (where applicable) are the same as in [ocPredprob()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    
                    
                      
#' However when compared to [ocPredprob()], where the predictive probability of `response rate > p0`

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
#' was used to reach decisions, here the `response rate - p0 > 0` is replaced by `response rate - p0 > delta`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
#' and the reason is that `p0` is now also uncertain, which is quantified by a posterior distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      
#' To therefore understand the margin of difference between the experimental and control group, refer

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
#' to the two ways of calculating delta in [postprobDist()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
#' The margin `delta` from [postprobDist()] is no longer used however where a Go decision is evaluated,

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
#' the margin `deltaE` is instead employed, and where a Stop decision is evaluated,

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
#' the margin `deltaF` is instead employed in lieu of `delta`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    
                    
                      
#' Decision 1 and Decision 2 share the same Go rule for interim and final,

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    
                    
                      
#' with the margin of difference is accounted for in the following manner for the final looks:

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    
                    
                      
#' - `Pr(P_E > p0 + deltaE | data) > tT ` for the absolute case

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    
                    
                      
#' - `Pr(P_E > (1-p0)*deltaE | data) > tT` for the relative case

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    
                    
                      
#' As mentioned, the rules of [ocPredprobDist()] and [ocPredprob()] for both Decision 1 and Decision 2 are the same,

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
#' and the margin of difference differ depending on whether it is a Go or Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    
                    
                      
#' (`deltaE` and `deltaF` is employed instead of `delta`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    
                    
                      
#' We highlight here another distinction between [ocPredprob()] and [ocPredprobDist()],

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    
                    
                      
#' seen in the evaluation for the final futility look in [ocPredprobDist()] where `p1` is used instead of `p0` :

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    
                    
                      
#' - `Pr(P_E < p1 + deltaF | data) > tF` for the absolute case

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    
                    
                      
#' - `Pr(P_E < (1-p1)*deltaF | data) > tF` for the relative case

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements:

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    
                    
                      
#' - `oc`: matrix with operating characteristics with the following details:

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      
#'    - `ExpectedN`: expected number of patients in the trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
#'    - `PrStopEarly`: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
#'                    maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    
                    
                      
#'    - `PrEarlyEff`: probability of Early Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
#'    - `PrEarlyFut`: probability of for Early Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      
#'    - `PrEfficacy`: probability of Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
#'    - `PrFutility`: probability of Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    
                    
                      
#'    - `PrGrayZone`: probability between Go and Stop ,"Evaluate" or Gray decision zone

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      
#' - `Decision` : numeric of results with `TRUE` as Go decision, `FALSE` as Stop and `NA` as gray zone.

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    
                    
                      
#' - `SampleSize` : numeric of sample sizes from `nnE` or `nnF` or both.

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    
                    
                      
#' - `wiggled_nnE` : user input for `nnE` with random distance applied.

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    
                    
                      
#' - `wiggled_nnF` : user input for `nnF` with random distance applied.

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    
                    
                      
#' - `wiggled_dist` : magnitude of random distance applied in order of input looks.

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    
                    
                      
#' - `params` : all user input arguments.

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/ocPredprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_decision_one_predprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ocPredprob

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    
                    
                      
ocPredprobDist <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    
                    
                      
    nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    
                    
                      
    truep,

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    
                    
                      
    deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    
                    
                      
    deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    
                    
                      
    phiU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    
                    
                      
    xS = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    
                    
                      
    nS = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    
                    
                      
    relativeDelta = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    
                    
                      
    tT = 1 - tF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    
                    
                      
    tF = 1 - tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    
                    
                      
    phiL = 1 - phiFu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    
                    
                      
    phiFu = 1 - phiL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    
                    
                      
    parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    
                    
                      
    parS = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    
                    
                      
    weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    
                    
                      
    weightsS = weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    
                    
                      
    sim = 50000,

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    
                    
                      
    wiggle = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    
                    
                      
    nnF = nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    
                    
                      
    decision1 = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    10x
                    
                      
  Nmax <- max(unique(nnE, nnF))

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    340
                    10x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnE, any.missing = FALSE, sorted = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    341
                    10x
                    
                      
  assert_number(sim, lower = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    342
                    10x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(wiggle)

                    		
                  

                  

                    343
                    10x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnF, lower = 1, any.missing = FALSE, sorted = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    344
                    10x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(decision1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    345
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    346
                    10x
                    
                      
  nn <- sort(unique(c(nnF, nnE)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    347
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (sim < 50000) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    348
                    10x
                    
                      
    warning("Advise to use sim >= 50000 to achieve convergence")

                    		
                  

                  

                    349
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    350
                    10x
                    
                      
  decision <- vector(length = sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    351
                    10x
                    
                      
  all_sizes <- vector(length = sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    352
                    10x
                    
                      
  all_looks <- vector(length = sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    353
                    10x
                    
                      
  for (k in seq_len(sim)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    354
                    410x
                    
                      
    if (length(nn) != 1 && wiggle) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    355
                    
                    
                      
      # if we have more than one look in nnF and nnE, we don't wiggle

                    		
                  

                  

                    356
                    410x
                    
                      
      dist <- h_get_distance(nn = nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    357
                    410x
                    
                      
      nnr <- h_get_looks(dist = dist, nnE = nnE, nnF = nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    358
                    410x
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnr$nnrE

                    		
                  

                  

                    359
                    410x
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnr$nnrF

                    		
                  

                  

                    360
                    410x
                    
                      
      orig_nnE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    361
                    410x
                    
                      
      orig_nnF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    362
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    363
                    !
                    
                      
      dist <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    364
                    !
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    365
                    !
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    366
                    !
                    
                      
      orig_nnE <- nnrE

                    		
                  

                  

                    367
                    !
                    
                      
      orig_nnF <- nnrF

                    		
                  

                  

                    368
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    369
                    410x
                    
                      
    nnr <- unique(sort(c(nnrE, nnrF)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    370
                    410x
                    
                      
    orig_nnr <- unique(sort(c(orig_nnE, orig_nnF)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    371
                    410x
                    
                      
    tmp <- if (decision1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    372
                    300x
                    
                      
      h_decision_one_predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    373
                    300x
                    
                      
        nnE = nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    374
                    300x
                    
                      
        nnF = nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    375
                    300x
                    
                      
        nnr = nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    376
                    300x
                    
                      
        truep = truep,

                    		
                  

                  

                    377
                    300x
                    
                      
        xS = xS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    378
                    300x
                    
                      
        nS = nS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    379
                    300x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    380
                    300x
                    
                      
        parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    381
                    300x
                    
                      
        tT = tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    382
                    300x
                    
                      
        phiU = phiU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    383
                    300x
                    
                      
        phiL = phiL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    384
                    300x
                    
                      
        deltaE = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    385
                    300x
                    
                      
        deltaF = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    386
                    300x
                    
                      
        weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    387
                    300x
                    
                      
        weightsS = weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    388
                    300x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    389
                    300x
                    
                      
        orig_nnr = orig_nnr

                    		
                  

                  

                    390
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    391
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    392
                    110x
                    
                      
      h_decision_two_predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    393
                    110x
                    
                      
        nnE = nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    394
                    110x
                    
                      
        nnF = nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    395
                    110x
                    
                      
        nnr = nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    396
                    110x
                    
                      
        truep = truep,

                    		
                  

                  

                    397
                    110x
                    
                      
        xS = xS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    398
                    110x
                    
                      
        nS = nS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    399
                    110x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    400
                    110x
                    
                      
        parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    401
                    110x
                    
                      
        tT = tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    402
                    110x
                    
                      
        tF = tF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    403
                    110x
                    
                      
        phiU = phiU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    404
                    110x
                    
                      
        phiFu = phiFu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    405
                    110x
                    
                      
        deltaE = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    406
                    110x
                    
                      
        deltaF = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    407
                    110x
                    
                      
        weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    408
                    110x
                    
                      
        weightsS = weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    409
                    110x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    410
                    110x
                    
                      
        orig_nnr = orig_nnr

                    		
                  

                  

                    411
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    412
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    413
                    410x
                    
                      
    decision[k] <- tmp$decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    414
                    410x
                    
                      
    all_sizes[k] <- tmp$all_sizes

                    		
                  

                  

                    415
                    410x
                    
                      
    all_looks[k] <- tmp$all_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    416
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    417
                    10x
                    
                      
  oc <- h_get_oc(all_sizes = all_sizes, Nmax = Nmax, decision = decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    418
                    10x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    419
                    10x
                    
                      
    oc = oc,

                    		
                  

                  

                    420
                    10x
                    
                      
    Decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    421
                    10x
                    
                      
    Looks = all_looks,

                    		
                  

                  

                    422
                    10x
                    
                      
    SampleSize = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    423
                    10x
                    
                      
    wiggled_nnrE = nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    424
                    10x
                    
                      
    wiggled_nnrF = nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    425
                    10x
                    
                      
    dist = dist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    426
                    10x
                    
                      
    params = as.list(match.call(expand.dots = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    427
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    428
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-Binomial Density Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the density function of the beta-binomial distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' The beta-binomial density function has the following form:

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' `p(x) = (m! / (x!*(m-x)!)) * Beta(x+a,m-x+b) / Beta(a,b)`

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed x : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of successes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed m : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of trials.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed a : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'  first parameter of the beta distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed b : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'  second parameter of the beta distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed log : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'  whether to return the log density value (not default).

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The density values of the beta-binomial distribution at `x`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/dbetabinom.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
dbetabinom <- function(x, m, a, b, log = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    90565x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(x, lower = 0, upper = m, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    90564x
                    
                      
  assert_number(m, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    90564x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(a, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    90564x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(b, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    90564x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(log)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    90564x
                    
                      
  log_ret <- lchoose(m, x) + lbeta(x + a, m - x + b) - lbeta(a, b)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    90564x
                    
                      
  if (log) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
    log_ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    90564x
                    
                      
    exp(log_ret)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-Mixture-Binomial Density Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the density function for a mixture of beta-binomial distributions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetabinom

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed par : matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'  the beta parameters matrix, with K rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'  corresponding to the beta parameters of the K components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed weights : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'  the mixture weights of the beta mixture prior of length K.

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'  Each element corresponds to the row of beta parameters in `par`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed log : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'  whether to return the log density value (not default).

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The (log) density values of the mixture of beta-binomial distributions at `x`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/dbetabinomMix.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
dbetabinomMix <- function(x, m, par, weights, log = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    90562x
                    
                      
  assert_matrix(par, min.rows = 1, min.cols = 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    90562x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(log)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    90562x
                    
                      
  ret <- sum(weights * dbetabinom(x, m, par[, 1], par[, 2]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    90561x
                    
                      
  if (log) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
    log(ret)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    90561x
                    
                      
    ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
dbetabinomMix <- Vectorize(dbetabinomMix, vectorize.args = "x")

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' Compute Beta-Mixture-Binomial Posterior Distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function that computes the posterior parameters of a beta-mixture-binomial distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetabinom

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetabinomMix

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the updated beta parameters and weights.

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats dbeta dbinom

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
h_getBetamixPost <- function(x, n, par, weights) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1316234x
                    
                      
  assert_number(x, lower = 0, upper = n, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1316232x
                    
                      
  assert_number(n, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1316232x
                    
                      
  assert_matrix(par, min.rows = 1, max.cols = 2, mode = "numeric")

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    1316232x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(weights, min.len = 0, len = nrow(par), finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
  # We renormalize weights.

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    1316229x
                    
                      
  weights <- weights / sum(weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
  # We now compute updated parameters.

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    1316229x
                    
                      
  postPar <- par

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    1316229x
                    
                      
  postPar[, 1] <- postPar[, 1] + x

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    1316229x
                    
                      
  postPar[, 2] <- postPar[, 2] + n - x

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  # We compute updated mixture probabilities.

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    1316229x
                    
                      
  tmp <- exp(

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    1316229x
                    
                      
    lbeta(a = postPar[, 1], b = postPar[, 2]) - lbeta(a = par[, 1], b = par[, 2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  # We compute the updated weights of the posterior

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    1316229x
                    
                      
  postWeights <- weights * tmp / sum(weights * tmp)

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    1316229x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(postWeights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    1316229x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    1316229x
                    
                      
    par = postPar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    1316229x
                    
                      
    weights = postWeights

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-Mixture density function

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' This function calculates beta-mixture density values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#' The beta-mixture distribution is defined by K beta parameters and the corresponding weights.

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetabinom

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetabinomMix

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed log : flag
