                    117
                    
                    
                      
#'  whether log values of the beta-mixture density function are returned.

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#' @return the (log) density values

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/dbetaMix.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
dbetaMix <- function(x, par, weights, log = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    1791671x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(weights, lower = 0, upper = 1, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    1791671x
                    
                      
  assert_true(all.equal(sum(weights), 1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    1791670x
                    
                      
  assert_true(identical(length(weights), nrow(par)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    1791670x
                    
                      
  degree <- length(weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    1791670x
                    
                      
  component_densities <- matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    1791670x
                    
                      
    dbeta(rep(x, each = degree), par[, 1], par[, 2]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    1791670x
                    
                      
    nrow = degree,

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    1791670x
                    
                      
    ncol = length(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    1791670x
                    
                      
  ret <- as.numeric(weights %*% component_densities)

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    1791670x
                    
                      
  if (log) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
    log(ret)

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    1791670x
                    
                      
    ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-Mixture CDF

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the CDF of the Beta-Mixture distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed q : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#'  the abscissa.

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed par : matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#'  the beta parameters matrix, with K rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#'  corresponding to the beta parameters of the K components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed weights : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#'  the mixture weights of the beta mixture prior which add up to 1.

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed lower.tail : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#'  if `TRUE` (default), probabilities are `P[X <= x]`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#'  and otherwise `P[X > x]`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The (one minus) cdf value

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#' @note `q` can be a vector.

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/pbetaMix.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats pbeta

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
pbetaMix <- function(q, par, weights, lower.tail = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    7x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(q, lower = 0, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    7x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(weights, lower = 0, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    7x
                    
                      
  assert_matrix(par)

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    7x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(lower.tail)

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    7x
                    
                      
  .pbetaMix(q = q, par = par, weights = weights, lower.tail = lower.tail)

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
.pbetaMix <- function(q, par, weights, lower.tail) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    3617507x
                    
                      
  degree <- length(weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    3617507x
                    
                      
  component_p <- matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    3617507x
                    
                      
    pbeta(rep(q, each = degree), par[, 1], par[, 2], lower.tail = lower.tail),

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    3617507x
                    
                      
    nrow = degree,

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    3617507x
                    
                      
    ncol = length(q)

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    3617507x
                    
                      
  as.numeric(weights %*% component_p)

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta-Mixture Quantile Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the quantile of the Beta-Mixture distribution for a given probability.

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed p : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#'  the required probability.

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed par : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
#'  the beta parameters matrix, with K rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
#'  corresponding to the beta parameters of the K components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed weights : matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
#'  the mixture weights of the beta mixture prior.

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed lower.tail : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
#'  whether CDF at x taken at lower or upper tail

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The abscissa.

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/qbetaMix.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
qbetaMix <- function(p, par, weights, lower.tail = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    513722x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(p, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    513722x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(weights, lower = 0, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    513722x
                    
                      
  assert_matrix(par)

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    513722x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(lower.tail)

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    513722x
                    
                      
  grid <- seq(0, 1, len = 31)

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    513722x
                    
                      
  f_grid <- .pbetaMix(grid, par, weights, lower.tail = lower.tail)

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    513722x
                    
                      
  sapply(p, function(p) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
    # special cases

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    1027539x
                    
                      
    if (p == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    2x
                    
                      
      return(0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    1027537x
                    
                      
    if (p == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    513719x
                    
                      
      return(1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    513818x
                    
                      
    diff <- f_grid - p

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    513818x
                    
                      
    pos <- diff > 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    513818x
                    
                      
    grid_interval <- c(grid[!pos][which.max(diff[!pos])], grid[pos][which.min(diff[pos])])

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    513818x
                    
                      
    uniroot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    513818x
                    
                      
      f = function(q) .pbetaMix(q, par, weights, lower.tail = lower.tail) - p,

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    513818x
                    
                      
      interval = grid_interval,

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    513818x
                    
                      
      f.lower = -p,

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    513818x
                    
                      
      f.upper = 1 - p,

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    513818x
                    
                      
      tol = sqrt(.Machine$double.eps)

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    513818x
                    
                      
    )$root

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include postprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Evaluate Posteriors based on Efficacy and Futility Thresholds in Two-Armed trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function adapted from [h_get_decision()] by

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' replacing the internal use of [postprob()] with [postprobDist()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' to generate the `decision` and random looks `all_sizes`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams postprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_oc

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed deltaE : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' margin by which the response rate in the treatment group should

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' be better than in the standard of care or control or `S` group in Efficacy looks only.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' Note that this can also be negative as well.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed deltaF : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' margin by which the response rate in the treatment group should

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' be better than in the standard of care or control or `S` group in Futility looks only.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' Note that this can also be negative as well.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
h_get_decisionDist <- function(nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
                               nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
                               nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
                               truep,

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
                               parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
                               parS = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
                               tL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
                               tU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
                               deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
                               deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
                               relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
                               orig_nnr) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    303x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnr, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    303x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnrE, max.len = length(nnr), any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    303x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnrF, max.len = length(nnr), any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    303x
                    
                      
  assert_number(truep, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    303x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parE, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    303x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parS, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    303x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tL, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    303x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tU, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    303x
                    
                      
  assert_number(deltaE, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    303x
                    
                      
  assert_number(deltaF, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    303x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(relativeDelta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    303x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(orig_nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    303x
                    
                      
  index_look <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    303x
                    
                      
  size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    303x
                    
                      
  all_sizes <- decision <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    303x
                    
                      
  response <- stats::rbinom(max(nnr), size = 1, truep)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    303x
                    
                      
  while (is.na(decision) && index_look <= length(nnr)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    538x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnrF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    296x
                    
                      
      qL <- postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    296x
                    
                      
        x = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    296x
                    
                      
        n = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    296x
                    
                      
        xS = sum(response[1:size_look]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    296x
                    
                      
        nS = size_look,

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    296x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    296x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    296x
                    
                      
        parE = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    296x
                    
                      
        parS = parE

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    296x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(qL >= tL, FALSE, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    296x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    538x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnrE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    491x
                    
                      
      qU <- postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    491x
                    
                      
        x = sum(response[1:size_look]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    491x
                    
                      
        n = size_look,

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    491x
                    
                      
        xS = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    491x
                    
                      
        nS = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    491x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    491x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    491x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    491x
                    
                      
        parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    491x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(qU < tU, decision, TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    491x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    538x
                    
                      
    all_sizes <- size_look

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    538x
                    
                      
    index_look <- index_look + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    538x
                    
                      
    size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    303x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    303x
                    
                      
    decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    303x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    303x
                    
                      
    all_looks = all_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate Operating characteristics of Posterior Probability method

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' with Beta Prior on the Control or Standard of Care Arm

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' The trial is stopped for Efficacy if the posterior probability of assumed

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' true response rate or `truep` is better than the control arm by at least

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' `deltaE`, is larger than `tU`. Analogously, The trial is stopped for Efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' if the posterior probability of assumed true response rate or `truep` is

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' better than the control arm by at least `deltaF`, is larger than `tL`

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' for Futility looks. If these criteria are not met, the trial is continued

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' and at the maximum sample size, it may reach no decision or "gray zone".The

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' following represents the stopping criteria for Efficacy and Futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' respectively.

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' Stop criteria for Efficacy :

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' `Pr(RR > P_S + deltaE) > tU`

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' Stop criteria for Futility :

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' `Pr(RR < P_S + deltaF) > tL`

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' Where `truep` is the assumed true rate of response and `p1` and `p0` respectively are

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#' the thresholds for Efficacy and Futility respectively.

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' Resulting operating characteristics include the following:

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ExpectedN`: expected number of patients in the trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrStopEarly`: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyEff`: probability of Early Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyFut`: probability of for Early Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEfficacy`: probability of Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrFutility`: probability of Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrGrayZone`: probability between Go and Stop ,"Evaluate" or Gray decision zone

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ocPostprob

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams postprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decisionDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_distance

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed deltaE : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#'  margin of which the response rate in the treatment group should be better

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#'  than in the standard of care of `group`. Delta for Efficacy is used to

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#'  calculate `P(truep > P_S + deltaE)` which should

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#'  exceed threshold `tU` to to stop for Efficacy. `DeltaE` can also be negative in

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#'  non-inferiority setting. See also note.

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed deltaF : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#'  margin of which the response rate in the treatment group should be better

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#'  than in the standard of care of `group`. Delta for Futility is used to

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'  calculate  `P(truep > P_S - deltaF)` which should

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#'  exceed threshold `tL` to stop for Futility.`DeltaF` can also be negative in

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#'  non-inferiority setting. See also note.

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#' @note

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' ## Delta :

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' The desired improvement is denoted as `deltaE` or `deltaF` and two options

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#' exist in its use: The absolute case when `relativeDelta = FALSE` and

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' relative as when `relativeDelta = TRUE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#' 1. The absolute case is when we define an absolute delta, greater than `P_S`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' the response rate of the standard of care or control or `S` group such that

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#' the posterior is `Pr(truep > P_S + deltaE | data)` for Efficacy looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' or `Pr(truep > P_S + deltaF | data)` for Futility looks.

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#' 2. In the relative case, we suppose that the treatment group's

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#' response rate is assumed to be greater than `P_S + (1-P_S) * delta` such that

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#' the posterior is `Pr(truep > P_S + (1 - P_S) * deltaE | data)` for Efficacy looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#' or `Pr(truep > P_S + (1 - P_S) * deltaF | data)` for Futility looks.

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/ocPostprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
ocPostprobDist <- function(nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
                           truep,

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
                           deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
                           deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
                           relativeDelta = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
                           tL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
                           tU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
                           parE = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
                           parS = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
                           wiggle = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
                           sim = 50000,

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
                           nnF = nnE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnE, min.len = 1, lower = 1, upper = max(nnE), any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(truep, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(deltaE, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(deltaF, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(relativeDelta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tL, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tU, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parE, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parS, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(sim, lower = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(wiggle)

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnF, min.len = 0, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    5x
                    
                      
  if (sim < 50000) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    5x
                    
                      
    warning("Advise to use sim >= 50000 to achieve convergence")

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    5x
                    
                      
  decision <- vector(length = sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    5x
                    
                      
  all_sizes <- vector(length = sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    5x
                    
                      
  all_looks <- vector(length = sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    5x
                    
                      
  nnE <- sort(nnE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    5x
                    
                      
  nnF <- sort(nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    5x
                    
                      
  nn <- sort(unique(c(nnF, nnE)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    5x
                    
                      
  nL <- length(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    5x
                    
                      
  Nstart <- nn[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    5x
                    
                      
  Nmax <- nn[nL]

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
  # simulate a clinical trial sim times

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    5x
                    
                      
  for (k in seq_len(sim)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    300x
                    
                      
    if (length(nn) != 1 && wiggle) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
      # randomly generate look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    250x
                    
                      
      dist <- h_get_distance(nn = nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    250x
                    
                      
      nnr <- h_get_looks(dist = dist, nnE = nnE, nnF = nnF) # we generate sim number of looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    250x
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnr$nnrE

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    250x
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnr$nnrF

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    250x
                    
                      
      orig_nnE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    250x
                    
                      
      orig_nnF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    50x
                    
                      
      dist <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    50x
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    50x
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    50x
                    
                      
      orig_nnE <- nnrE

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    50x
                    
                      
      orig_nnF <- nnrF

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    300x
                    
                      
    nnr <- unique(c(nnrE, nnrF))

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    300x
                    
                      
    orig_nnr <- unique(c(orig_nnE, orig_nnF))

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    300x
                    
                      
    tmp <- h_get_decisionDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    300x
                    
                      
      nnr = nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    300x
                    
                      
      nnrE = nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    300x
                    
                      
      nnrF = nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    300x
                    
                      
      truep = truep,

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    300x
                    
                      
      parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    300x
                    
                      
      tL = tL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    300x
                    
                      
      tU = tU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    300x
                    
                      
      deltaE = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    300x
                    
                      
      deltaF = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    300x
                    
                      
      relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    300x
                    
                      
      orig_nnr = orig_nnr

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    300x
                    
                      
    decision[k] <- tmp$decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    300x
                    
                      
    all_sizes[k] <- tmp$all_sizes

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    300x
                    
                      
    all_looks[k] <- tmp$all_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    5x
                    
                      
  oc <- h_get_oc(all_sizes = all_sizes, Nmax = Nmax, decision = decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    5x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    5x
                    
                      
    oc = oc,

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    5x
                    
                      
    Decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    5x
                    
                      
    Looks = all_looks,

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    5x
                    
                      
    SampleSize = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    5x
                    
                      
    union_nn = nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    5x
                    
                      
    input_nnE = nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    5x
                    
                      
    input_nnF = nnF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    5x
                    
                      
    wiggled_nnE = nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    5x
                    
                      
    wiggled_nnF = nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    5x
                    
                      
    wiggle_dist = dist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    5x
                    
                      
    params = as.list(match.call(expand.dots = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Run simulations to obtain operating characteristics for methods that include

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#' historical data on control

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Interim looks are done three times total including the last one, with

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' approximately equal distance between the looks.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param method 8 different methods can be selected:

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' PointMass.Bayes: single arm trial with pointmass derived from the historical

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' data on the control response rate, see \code{\link{postprob}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior.Bayes: single arm trial with prior derived from the historical data on

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' the control response rate, see \code{\link{postprobDist}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' RCT.Bayes: RCT (1:1 randomization) with prior derived from the historical data on

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' the control response rate, see \code{\link{postprobDist}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' RCT.BayesRobust: Same as RCT.Bayes, but with a robust prior, enabling

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' dynamic borrowing of the historical information

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' RCT.vanillaBayes: RCT, not using the historical control data

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' PointMass.PP: single arm trial with pointmass derived from the historical

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' data on the control response rate, and using the predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' method, see \code{\link{predprob}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior.PP: single arm trial with prior derived from the historical data on

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' the control response rate, and using the predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' method, see \code{\link{predprobDist}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' RCT.PP: RCT (1:1 randomization) with prior derived from the historical data on

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' the control response rate, and using the predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' method, see \code{\link{predprobDist}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' RCT.PProbust: Same as RCT.PP,  but with a robust prior, enabling

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' dynamic borrowing of the historical information

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' RCT.vanillaPP: RCT and using the predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' method, not using the historical control data

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nSim number of trials to simulate

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @param histSize historical data size

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @param trialSize total trial sample size

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @param drift drift parameter: the actual control response rate is the

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' historical control response rate plus the drift. Hence a positive drift

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' means that the controls now have higher response rates than in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' historical trial.

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @param controlRate the actual control response rate

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nmeRate the treatment response rate

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @param delta delta for stopping for efficacy to be used. Implicitly a zero

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' delta for stopping for futility is used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tL for Bayes methods: probability threshold for being below control

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' response rate (default: 0.8)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tU for Bayes methods: probability threshold for being above control

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' response rate + delta (default: 0.8)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tT threshold for the probability to be above the response rate p0 at
