                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' the end of the trial (default: 0.85)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @param phiL lower threshold on the predictive probability (default: 0.05)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @param phiU upper threshold on the predictive probability (default: 0.95)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parE the beta parameters matrix, with K rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' corresponding to the beta parameters of the K components. Default is a

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' uniform prior.

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @param weights the mixture weights of the beta mixture prior. Default are

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' uniform weights across mixture components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Returned operating characteristics in a matrix include:

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' ExpectedN: expected number of patients in the trials

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' ExpectedNactive: expected number of patients with treatment

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' PrStopEarly: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEarlyEff: probability to decide for efficacy early

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEarlyFut: probability to decide for futility early

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' PrEfficacy: probability to decide for efficacy

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' PrFutility: probability to decide for futility

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' PrGrayZone: probability of no decision at the end ("gray zone")

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats rbinom

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/oc2.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
oc2 <- function(method =

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
                  c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
                    "PointMass.Bayes", "Prior.Bayes",

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
                    "RCT.Bayes", "RCT.BayesRobust", "RCTvanilla.Bayes",

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
                    "PointMass.PP", "Prior.PP",

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
                    "RCT.PP", "RCT.PProbust", "RCTvanilla.PP"

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
                  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
                nSim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
                histSize,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
                trialSize,

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
                drift = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
                controlRate,

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
                nmeRate,

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
                delta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
                ## for Bayes methods:

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
                tL = 0.8,

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
                tU = 0.8,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
                ## for PP methods:

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
                tT = 0.85,

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
                phiL = 0.05,

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
                phiU = 0.95,

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
                ## prior on NME response rate:

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
                parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
                weights) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
  method <- match.arg(method)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
  bayesNames <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
    "PointMass.Bayes", "Prior.Bayes", "RCT.Bayes", "RCT.BayesRobust",

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
    "RCTvanilla.Bayes"

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
  ppNames <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    !
                    
                      
    "PointMass.PP", "Prior.PP", "RCT.PP", "RCT.PProbust",

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
    "RCTvanilla.PP"

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  ## if parE is a vector => situation where there is only one component

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
  if (is.vector(parE)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
    ## check that it has exactly two entries

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    !
                    
                      
    stopifnot(identical(length(parE), 2L))

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
    ## and transpose to matrix with one row

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
    parE <- t(parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
  ## if prior weights of the beta mixture are not supplied

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
  if (missing(weights)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
    weights <- rep(1, nrow(parE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
    ## (don't need to be normalized, this is done in h_getBetamixPost)

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
  ## allocation to active and control arms:

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    !
                    
                      
  activeProp <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    !
                    
                      
    if (method %in% c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
      "RCT.Bayes",

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    !
                    
                      
      "RCT.BayesRobust",

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
      "RCTvanilla.Bayes",

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    !
                    
                      
      "RCT.PP",

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    !
                    
                      
      "RCT.PProbust",

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    !
                    
                      
      "RCTvanilla.PP"

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
    )) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
      ## randomize 1:1

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    !
                    
                      
      1 / 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
      ## only active here

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    !
                    
                      
      1

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
  ## deltas for prior methods:

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    !
                    
                      
  deltaE <- delta

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
  deltaF <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
  ## drift is accounted for:

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
  histRate <- controlRate - drift

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
  ## s: decision reject H0 (TRUE) or fail to reject (FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
  ##    during trial if continuing (NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    !
                    
                      
  s <- rep(NA, nSim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    !
                    
                      
  n <- nActive <- nControl <- integer(length(s))

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
  ## looks: three times total including the last one,

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
  ## approx equal distance.

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    !
                    
                      
  nn <- ceiling(seq(from = 1, to = trialSize, length = 3 + 1))[-1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    !
                    
                      
  nn <- sort(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    !
                    
                      
  nr <- FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    !
                    
                      
  nL <- length(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    !
                    
                      
  Nstart <- nn[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
  Nmax <- nn[nL]

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    !
                    
                      
  NmaxActive <- ceiling(activeProp * Nmax)

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    !
                    
                      
  NmaxControl <- Nmax - NmaxActive

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    !
                    
                      
  if (nr && is.null(d)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
    ## set parameter d for randomly generating look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    !
                    
                      
    d <- floor(min(nn - c(0, nn[-nL])) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    !
                    
                      
  nnr <- nn

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
  for (k in 1:nSim) { ## simulate a clinical trial nSim times

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    !
                    
                      
    if (nr && (d > 0)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
      ## randomly generate look locations

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    !
                    
                      
      dd <- sample(-d:d,

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    !
                    
                      
        size = nL - 1, replace = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    !
                    
                      
        prob = 2^(c(-d:0, rev(-d:(-1))) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    !
                    
                      
      nnr <- nn + c(dd, 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
    ## simulate sequence of patients

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    !
                    
                      
    isActive <- sample(

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    !
                    
                      
      x =

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    !
                    
                      
        rep(

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    !
                    
                      
          c(TRUE, FALSE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    !
                    
                      
          c(NmaxActive, NmaxControl)

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
        ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    !
                    
                      
      size = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    !
                    
                      
      replace = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
    ## generate the control data (binomial distribution)

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    !
                    
                      
    xHist <- stats::rbinom(n = 1L, size = histSize, prob = histRate)

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
    ## this generates p0:

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    !
                    
                      
    p0 <- xHist / histSize

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
    ## and with the delta this gives p1:

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    !
                    
                      
    p1 <- min(p0 + delta, 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
    ## for the prior methods, these are the

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
    ## beta parameters:

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    !
                    
                      
    parS <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    !
                    
                      
      if (method %in% c("RCTvanilla.Bayes", "RCTvanilla.PP")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
        ## change parS to uniform in RCT vanilla case

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    !
                    
                      
        c(1, 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    !
                    
                      
      } else if (method %in% c("RCT.BayesRobust", "RCT.PProbust")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
        ## specify a robust prior using the historical data

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
        ## beta mixture (50% weight each) of the informative

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
        ## and uniform distribution:

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    !
                    
                      
        matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    !
                    
                      
          data =

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    !
                    
                      
            c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    !
                    
                      
              1 + xHist, 1 + histSize - xHist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    !
                    
                      
              1, 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
            ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    !
                    
                      
          nrow = 2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    !
                    
                      
          byrow = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
        ## note that, because the default is a uniform distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
        ## across the mixture components, we do not need to manually

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
        ## specify the weights.

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
        ## otherwise we use the historical data without robustification

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    !
                    
                      
        c(1 + xHist, 1 + histSize - xHist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
    ## generate the trial data (Bernoulli distribution)

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
    ## simulate sequence of responses

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    !
                    
                      
    x <- stats::rbinom(Nmax, 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    !
                    
                      
      prob = ifelse(isActive, nmeRate, controlRate)

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
    ## start trial

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    !
                    
                      
    j <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    !
                    
                      
    i <- nnr[j]

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    !
                    
                      
    while (is.na(s[k]) && (j <= length(nnr))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    !
                    
                      
      if (method == "PointMass.Bayes") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
        ## PointMass.Bayes

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    !
                    
                      
        qL <- 1 - postprob(x = sum(x[1:i]), n = i, p = p0, parE = parE, weights = weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    !
                    
                      
        qU <- postprob(x = sum(x[1:i]), n = i, p = p1, parE = parE, weights = weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    !
                    
                      
      } else if (method %in% c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    !
                    
                      
        "Prior.Bayes",

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    !
                    
                      
        "RCT.Bayes",

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    !
                    
                      
        "RCT.BayesRobust",

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    !
                    
                      
        "RCTvanilla.Bayes"

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
      )) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
        ## current data in both arms:

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    !
                    
                      
        xActive <- x[which(isActive[1:i])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    !
                    
                      
        xControl <- x[which(!isActive[1:i])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
        ## compute the two probabilities

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    !
                    
                      
        qL <- postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    !
                    
                      
          x = sum(xControl), n = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    !
                    
                      
          xS = sum(xActive), nS = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    !
                    
                      
          delta = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    !
                    
                      
          parE = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    !
                    
                      
          parS = parE, weightsS = weights

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    !
                    
                      
        qU <- postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    !
                    
                      
          x = sum(xControl), n = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    !
                    
                      
          xS = sum(xActive), nS = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    !
                    
                      
          delta = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    !
                    
                      
          parE = parE, weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    !
                    
                      
          parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      
        ## sample sizes: in both arms

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    !
                    
                      
        nActive[k] <- length(xActive)

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    !
                    
                      
        nControl[k] <- length(xControl)

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    !
                    
                      
      } else if (method == "PointMass.PP") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
        ## PointMass.PP

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    !
                    
                      
        q <- predprob(

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    !
                    
                      
          x = sum(x[1:i]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    !
                    
                      
          n = i, Nmax = Nmax, p = p1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    !
                    
                      
          thetaT = tT, parE = parE, weights = weights

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    !
                    
                      
        )$result

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    !
                    
                      
      } else if (method %in% c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    !
                    
                      
        "Prior.PP",

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    !
                    
                      
        "RCT.PP",

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    !
                    
                      
        "RCT.PProbust",

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    !
                    
                      
        "RCTvanilla.PP"

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
      )) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      
        ## current data in both arms:

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    !
                    
                      
        xActive <- x[which(isActive[1:i])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    !
                    
                      
        xControl <- x[which(!isActive[1:i])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
        ## compute predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    !
                    
                      
        q <- predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    !
                    
                      
          x = sum(xActive), n = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    !
                    
                      
          xS = sum(xControl), nS = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    !
                    
                      
          Nmax = NmaxActive, NmaxControl = NmaxControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    !
                    
                      
          delta = delta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    !
                    
                      
          thetaT = tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    !
                    
                      
          parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    !
                    
                      
          weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    !
                    
                      
          parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    !
                    
                      
        )$result

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    
                    
                      
        ## sample sizes: in both arms

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    !
                    
                      
        nActive[k] <- length(xActive)

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    !
                    
                      
        nControl[k] <- length(xControl)

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    
                    
                      
      ## decision depends on whether Bayes or PP is used:

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    !
                    
                      
      s[k] <- if (method %in% bayesNames) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    !
                    
                      
        ifelse(qU >= tU, TRUE, ifelse(qL >= tL, FALSE, NA))

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    !
                    
                      
        ifelse(q >= phiU & !(i < Nmax & phiU == 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    !
                    
                      
          TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    !
                    
                      
          ifelse(q <= phiL, FALSE, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    
                    
                      
      ## advance iterators

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    !
                    
                      
      n[k] <- i

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    !
                    
                      
      j <- j + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    !
                    
                      
      i <- nnr[j]

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    !
                    
                      
  oc <- cbind(

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    !
                    
                      
    ExpectedN = mean(n),

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    !
                    
                      
    ExpectedNactive = mean(nActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    !
                    
                      
    ExpectedNcontrol = mean(nControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    !
                    
                      
    PrStopEarly = mean(n < Nmax),

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEarlyEff = sum(s * (n < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / nSim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEarlyFut = sum((1 - s) * (n < Nmax), na.rm = TRUE) / nSim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    !
                    
                      
    PrEfficacy = sum(s, na.rm = TRUE) / nSim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    !
                    
                      
    PrFutility = sum(1 - s, na.rm = TRUE) / nSim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    !
                    
                      
    PrGrayZone = sum(is.na(s) / nSim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    
                    
                      
  ## return OC

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    !
                    
                      
  return(oc)

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Generating random decision and sample size looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function for [ocRctPostprobDist()] to generate numeric of decisions `decisions` and

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' random looks `all_sizes`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decision_one_predprob

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decision_two_predprob

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed randRatio : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'  The randomisation ratio between treatment and control. Must be greater than 0 and maximum of 1.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed Nmax : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' The max sample size or the sample size of final look.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements :

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `decision` : decision `flag` with `TRUE` for Go, `FALSE` for Stop, `NA` for Gray zone.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `all_sizes` : resulting number of look size, anything below maximum

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   look size is an indicated interim, Futility or Efficacy or both.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `nActive` : mean of look size for Active arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `nControl` : mean of look size for Control arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
h_get_decisionDist_rct <- function(nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
                                   nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
                                   nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
                                   pE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
                                   pS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
                                   parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
                                   parS = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
                                   tL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
                                   tU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
                                   deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
                                   deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
                                   relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
                                   randRatio = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
                                   Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
                                   orig_nnr) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnr, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnrE, max.len = length(nnr), any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnrF, max.len = length(nnr), any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_number(pE, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_number(pS, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parE, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parS, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tL, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tU, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_number(deltaE, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_number(deltaF, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(relativeDelta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_number(randRatio, na.ok = FALSE, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_number(Nmax, lower = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    302x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(orig_nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    302x
                    
                      
  index_look <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    302x
                    
                      
  size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    302x
                    
                      
  all_sizes <- decision <- nActive <- nControl <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    302x
                    
                      
  activeProp <- randRatio / (randRatio + 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    302x
                    
                      
  NmaxActive <- ceiling(activeProp * Nmax)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    302x
                    
                      
  NmaxControl <- Nmax - NmaxActive

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    302x
                    
                      
  isActive <- sample(

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    302x
                    
                      
    x = rep(c(TRUE, FALSE), c(NmaxActive, NmaxControl)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    302x
                    
                      
    size = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    302x
                    
                      
    replace = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    302x
                    
                      
  response <- rbinom(Nmax, size = 1, prob = ifelse(isActive, pE, pS))

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    302x
                    
                      
  while (is.na(decision) && index_look <= length(nnr)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
    ## current data in both arms:

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    689x
                    
                      
    xActive <- response[which(isActive[1:size_look])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    689x
                    
                      
    xControl <- response[which(!isActive[1:size_look])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    689x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnrF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    564x
                    
                      
      qL <- postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    564x
                    
                      
        x = sum(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    564x
                    
                      
        n = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    564x
                    
                      
        xS = sum(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    564x
                    
                      
        nS = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    564x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    564x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    564x
                    
                      
        parE = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    564x
                    
                      
        parS = parE

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    564x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(qL >= tL, FALSE, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    564x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    689x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnrE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    685x
                    
                      
      qU <- postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    685x
                    
                      
        x = sum(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    685x
                    
                      
        n = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    685x
                    
                      
        xS = sum(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    685x
                    
                      
        nS = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    685x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    685x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    685x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    685x
                    
                      
        parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    685x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(qU < tU, decision, TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    685x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    689x
                    
                      
    nActive <- length(xActive)

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    689x
                    
                      
    nControl <- length(xControl)

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    689x
                    
                      
    all_sizes <- size_look

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    689x
                    
                      
    index_look <- index_look + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    689x
                    
                      
    size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    302x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    302x
                    
                      
    decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    302x
                    
                      
    all_looks = all_looks,

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    302x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    302x
                    
                      
    nActive = nActive,

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    302x
                    
                      
    nControl = nControl

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' Creating list for operating characteristics

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' Generates operating characteristics for [ocRctPostprobDist()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decisionDist_rct

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list of results containing :

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ExpectedN`: expected number of patients in the trials in both treatment and SOC group

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrStopEarly`: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyEff`: probability of Early Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyFut`: probability of for Early Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEfficacy`: probability of Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrFutility`: probability of Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrGrayZone`: probability between Go and Stop ,"Evaluate" or Gray decision zone

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ExpectedNactive` : the mean of the number of patients in treatment arm

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ExpectedNcontrol`: the mean of the number of patients in control arm

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
h_get_oc_rct <- function(all_sizes, Nmax, nActive, nControl, decision) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    13x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nActive, any.missing = FALSE, len = length(all_sizes))

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    13x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nControl, any.missing = FALSE, len = length(all_sizes))

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    13x
                    
                      
  assert_true(all(nActive + nControl == all_sizes))

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    13x
                    
                      
  assert_true(Nmax >= max(all_sizes))

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    13x
                    
                      
  tmp <- h_get_oc(

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    13x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    13x
                    
                      
    Nmax = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    13x
                    
                      
    decision = decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    13x
                    
                      
  tmp$ExpectedNactive <- mean(nActive)

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    13x
                    
                      
  tmp$ExpectedNcontrol <- mean(nControl)

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    13x
                    
                      
  tmp

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
