}

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate operating characteristics for RCT against SOC,

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#' using the posterior probability method with beta priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#' We emulate a randomized-controlled trial setting where at any given sample size,

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' there exists the number of patients enrolled in either standard of care (SOC) or control arm, and

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' a treatment or experimental arm. The allocation of patients will depend on the

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#' randomization ratio set by the user and is rounded to the next higher integer.

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' Therefore the sequence of patients is determined from the start, such that the number of

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#' patients in both arms is constant across trial simulations, however the number of patients

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' within the control and treatment arm is determined by the randomisation ratio.

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' Interim looks are for sample sizes below that of the final sample size.

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#' Final looks are only performed at the maximum sample size.

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#' At each interim or final look, a futility or efficacy or both can be performed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#' The rules for Stop, Go and Gray Zone (where applicable), and use of beta priors are the same

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#' as in [ocPostprobDist()] where the only difference here is to emulate a

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#' randomized-controlled trial setting.

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#' The returned value is a list with the following elements:

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#' - `oc`: matrix with operating characteristics with the following details:

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ExpectedN`: expected number of patients in the trials in both treatment and SOC group

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ExpectedNactive` : the mean of the number of patients in treatment arm

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
#' - `ExpectedNcontrol`: the mean of the number of patients in control arm

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrStopEarly`: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyEff`: probability of Early Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEarlyFut`: probability of Early Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrEfficacy`: probability of Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrFutility`: probability of Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#' - `PrGrayZone`: probability of Evaluate or "Gray Zone" decision (between Go and Stop)

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#' - `Decision` : numeric of results with `TRUE` as Go, `FALSE` as Stop and `NA` as Evaluate decision.

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
#' - `SampleSize` : numeric of sample sizes from `nnE` or `nnF` or both.

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
#' - `wiggled_nnE` : user input for `nnE` with random distance applied.

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
#' - `wiggled_nnF` : user input for `nnF` with random distance applied.

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#' - `wiggled_dist` : magnitude of random distance applied in order of input looks.

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#' - `params` : all user input arguments.

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decisionDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decisionDist_rct

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ocPostprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed pE : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#'  Response rate in Treatment group.

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed pS : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
#'  Response rate in Control group.

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/ocRctPostprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
ocRctPostprobDist <- function(nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
                              pE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
                              pS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
                              deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
                              deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
                              relativeDelta = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
                              tL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
                              tU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
                              parE = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
                              parS = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
                              randRatio = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
                              sim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
                              wiggle = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
                              nnF = nnE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnE, min.len = 1, lower = 1, upper = max(nnE), any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_number(pE, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_number(pS, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_number(deltaE, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_number(deltaF, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(relativeDelta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tL, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_number(tU, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parE, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parS, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_number(sim, lower = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(wiggle)

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnF, min.len = 0, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (sim < 50000) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    6x
                    
                      
    warning("Advise to use sim >= 50000 to achieve convergence")

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    6x
                    
                      
  decision <- all_sizes <- all_looks <- nActive <- nControl <- vector(length = sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    6x
                    
                      
  nnE <- sort(nnE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    6x
                    
                      
  nnF <- sort(nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    6x
                    
                      
  nn <- sort(unique(c(nnF, nnE)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    6x
                    
                      
  nL <- length(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    6x
                    
                      
  nn <- sort(unique(c(nnF, nnE)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    6x
                    
                      
  nL <- length(nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    6x
                    
                      
  Nstart <- nn[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    6x
                    
                      
  Nmax <- nn[nL]

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    6x
                    
                      
  for (k in seq_len(sim)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    300x
                    
                      
    if (length(nn) != 1 && wiggle) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    50x
                    
                      
      dist <- h_get_distance(nn = nn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    50x
                    
                      
      nnr <- h_get_looks(dist = dist, nnE = nnE, nnF = nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    50x
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnr$nnrE

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    50x
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnr$nnrF

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    50x
                    
                      
      orig_nnE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    50x
                    
                      
      orig_nnF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    250x
                    
                      
      dist <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    250x
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    250x
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    250x
                    
                      
      orig_nnE <- nnrE

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    250x
                    
                      
      orig_nnF <- nnrF

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    300x
                    
                      
    nnr <- unique(c(nnrE, nnrF))

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    300x
                    
                      
    orig_nnr <- unique(sort(c(orig_nnE, orig_nnF)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    300x
                    
                      
    tmp <- h_get_decisionDist_rct(

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    300x
                    
                      
      nnr = nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    300x
                    
                      
      nnrE = nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    300x
                    
                      
      nnrF = nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    300x
                    
                      
      pE = pE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    300x
                    
                      
      pS = pS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    300x
                    
                      
      parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    300x
                    
                      
      parS = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    300x
                    
                      
      tL = tL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    300x
                    
                      
      tU = tU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    300x
                    
                      
      deltaE = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    300x
                    
                      
      deltaF = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    300x
                    
                      
      relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    300x
                    
                      
      Nmax = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    300x
                    
                      
      orig_nnr = orig_nnr

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    300x
                    
                      
    decision[k] <- tmp$decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    300x
                    
                      
    all_sizes[k] <- tmp$all_sizes

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    300x
                    
                      
    nActive[k] <- tmp$nActive

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    300x
                    
                      
    nControl[k] <- tmp$nControl

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    300x
                    
                      
    all_looks[k] <- tmp$all_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    6x
                    
                      
  oc <- h_get_oc_rct(

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    6x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    6x
                    
                      
    Nmax = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    6x
                    
                      
    nActive = nActive,

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    6x
                    
                      
    nControl = nControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    6x
                    
                      
    decision = decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    6x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    6x
                    
                      
    oc = oc,

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    6x
                    
                      
    ExpectedN = mean(all_sizes),

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    6x
                    
                      
    ExpectedNactive = mean(nActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    6x
                    
                      
    ExpectedNcontrol = mean(nControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    6x
                    
                      
    Decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    6x
                    
                      
    Looks = all_looks,

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    6x
                    
                      
    SampleSize = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    6x
                    
                      
    SampleSizeActive = nActive,

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    6x
                    
                      
    SampleSizeControl = nControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    6x
                    
                      
    union_nn = nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    6x
                    
                      
    wiggled_nnE = nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    6x
                    
                      
    wiggled_nnF = nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    6x
                    
                      
    wiggle_dist = dist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    6x
                    
                      
    params = as.list(match.call(expand.dots = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Generating random decision and sample size looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function for [ocRctPredprobDist()] to generate a single trial decision and sample size.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_decisionDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ocPredprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements :

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `decision` : decision `flag` with `TRUE` for Go, `FALSE` for Stop, `NA` for Gray zone.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `all_sizes` : resulting sample size.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `nActive` : number of patients in the active arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `nControl` : number of patients in the control arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
h_decision_one_RctpredprobDist <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
    nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
    nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
    nnF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
    pE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
    pS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
    parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
    phiU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    phiL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    relativeDelta = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    randRatio = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    orig_nnr) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    252x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnE, lower = 1, sorted = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    252x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnF, lower = 1, sorted = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    252x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnr, lower = 1, sorted = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    252x
                    
                      
  assert_number(pE, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    252x
                    
                      
  assert_number(pS, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    252x
                    
                      
  assert_number(randRatio, lower = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    252x
                    
                      
  Nmax <- max(nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    252x
                    
                      
  decision <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    252x
                    
                      
  activeProp <- randRatio / (randRatio + 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    252x
                    
                      
  NmaxActive <- ceiling(activeProp * Nmax)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    252x
                    
                      
  NmaxControl <- Nmax - NmaxActive

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    252x
                    
                      
  isActive <- sample(

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    252x
                    
                      
    x = rep(c(TRUE, FALSE), c(NmaxActive, NmaxControl)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    252x
                    
                      
    size = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    252x
                    
                      
    replace = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    252x
                    
                      
  response <- rbinom(Nmax, size = 1, prob = ifelse(isActive, pE, pS))

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    252x
                    
                      
  index_look <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    252x
                    
                      
  size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  ### Decision 1:

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  # The criteria for Decision 1 for Interim looks are :

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  # Interim GO =  P(successful trial at final) > phiU

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  # Interim STOP = P(successful trial at final) < phiL

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    252x
                    
                      
  while (is.na(decision) && index_look < length(nnr)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    278x
                    
                      
    xActive <- response[which(isActive[1:size_look])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    278x
                    
                      
    xControl <- response[which(!isActive[1:size_look])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    278x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    274x
                    
                      
      interim_qU <- predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    274x
                    
                      
        x = sum(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    274x
                    
                      
        n = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    274x
                    
                      
        xS = sum(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    274x
                    
                      
        nS = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    274x
                    
                      
        Nmax = NmaxActive,

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    274x
                    
                      
        NmaxControl = NmaxControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    274x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    274x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    274x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    274x
                    
                      
        weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    274x
                    
                      
        parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    274x
                    
                      
        weightsS = weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    274x
                    
                      
        thetaT = tT

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    274x
                    
                      
      )$result

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    274x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(interim_qU < phiL, FALSE, decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    274x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    278x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    274x
                    
                      
      interim_qU <- predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    274x
                    
                      
        x = sum(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    274x
                    
                      
        n = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    274x
                    
                      
        xS = sum(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    274x
                    
                      
        nS = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    274x
                    
                      
        Nmax = NmaxActive,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    274x
                    
                      
        NmaxControl = NmaxControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    274x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    274x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    274x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    274x
                    
                      
        weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    274x
                    
                      
        parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    274x
                    
                      
        weightsS = weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    274x
                    
                      
        thetaT = tT

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    274x
                    
                      
      )$result

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    274x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(interim_qU > phiU, TRUE, decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    274x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    278x
                    
                      
    index_look <- index_look + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    278x
                    
                      
    size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
  # The criteria for Decision 1 for Final looks are:

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
  # Final GO = P(RR > p0 + deltaE | data) => tT

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  # Final STOP = P(RR > p0 + deltaF | data ) < tT

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    252x
                    
                      
  if (is.na(decision)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    8x
                    
                      
    size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    8x
                    
                      
    xActive <- response[which(isActive[1:size_look])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    8x
                    
                      
    xControl <- response[which(!isActive[1:size_look])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    8x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    8x
                    
                      
      final_eff_qU <- postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    8x
                    
                      
        x = sum(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    8x
                    
                      
        n = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    8x
                    
                      
        xS = sum(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    8x
                    
                      
        nS = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    8x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    8x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    8x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    8x
                    
                      
        weights = weights, # for activeBetamixPost

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    8x
                    
                      
        parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    8x
                    
                      
        weightsS = weightsS # for controlBetamixPost

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    8x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(final_eff_qU >= tT, TRUE, decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    8x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    8x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    8x
                    
                      
      final_fu_qU <- postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    8x
                    
                      
        x = sum(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    8x
                    
                      
        n = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    8x
                    
                      
        xS = sum(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    8x
                    
                      
        nS = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    8x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    8x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    8x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    8x
                    
                      
        weights = weights, # for activeBetamixPost

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    8x
                    
                      
        parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    8x
                    
                      
        weightsS = weightsS # for controlBetamixPost

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    8x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(final_fu_qU < tT, FALSE, decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    8x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    252x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    252x
                    
                      
    nActive = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    252x
                    
                      
    nControl = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    252x
                    
                      
    decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    252x
                    
                      
    all_looks = all_looks,

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    252x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = length(xActive) + length(xControl)

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' Generating random decision and sample size looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function for [ocRctPredprobDist()] to generate a single trial decision and sample size.

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_decision_one_RctpredprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ocPredprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the following elements :

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `decision` : decision `flag` with `TRUE` for Go, `FALSE` for Stop, `NA` for Gray zone.

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `all_sizes` : resulting sample size.

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `nActive` : number of patients in the active arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `nControl` : number of patients in the control arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
h_decision_two_RctpredprobDist <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
    nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
    nnF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
    nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
    pE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
    pS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
    parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
    parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
    tF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
    tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
    phiU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
    phiFu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
    deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
    deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
    weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
    weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
    relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
    randRatio,

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
    orig_nnr) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    52x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnE, lower = 1, sorted = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    52x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnF, lower = 1, sorted = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    52x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnr, lower = 1, sorted = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    52x
                    
                      
  assert_number(pE, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    52x
                    
                      
  assert_number(pS, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    52x
                    
                      
  assert_number(randRatio, lower = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    52x
                    
                      
  Nmax <- max(nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    52x
                    
                      
  NmaxControl <- max(nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    52x
                    
                      
  index_look <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    52x
                    
                      
  size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    52x
                    
                      
  all_sizes <- decision <- nActive <- nControl <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    52x
                    
                      
  activeProp <- randRatio / (randRatio + 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    52x
                    
                      
  NmaxActive <- ceiling(activeProp * Nmax)

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    52x
                    
                      
  NmaxControl <- Nmax - NmaxActive

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    52x
                    
                      
  isActive <- sample(

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    52x
                    
                      
    x = rep(c(TRUE, FALSE), c(NmaxActive, NmaxControl)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    52x
                    
                      
    size = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    52x
                    
                      
    replace = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    52x
                    
                      
  response <- rbinom(Nmax, size = 1, prob = ifelse(isActive, pE, pS))

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    52x
                    
                      
  index_look <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    52x
                    
                      
  size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
  # The criteria for Decision 2 for Interim looks are :

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
  # Interim GO : P ( successful at final) > phiU

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
  # Interim STOP : P ( unsuccessful at final ) > phiFu

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    52x
                    
                      
  while (is.na(decision) && index_look < length(nnr)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    92x
                    
                      
    xActive <- response[which(isActive[1:size_look])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    92x
                    
                      
    xControl <- response[which(!isActive[1:size_look])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    92x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    23x
                    
                      
      interim_qU <- predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    23x
                    
                      
        x = sum(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    23x
                    
                      
        n = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    23x
                    
                      
        xS = sum(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    23x
                    
                      
        nS = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    23x
                    
                      
        Nmax = NmaxActive,

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    23x
                    
                      
        NmaxControl = NmaxControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    23x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    23x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    23x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    23x
                    
                      
        weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    23x
                    
                      
        parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    23x
                    
                      
        weightsS = weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    23x
                    
                      
        thetaT = tT

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    23x
                    
                      
      )$result

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    23x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(interim_qU > phiU, TRUE, decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    23x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    92x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    23x
                    
                      
      interim_qU <- 1 - predprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    23x
                    
                      
        x = sum(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    23x
                    
                      
        n = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    23x
                    
                      
        xS = sum(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    23x
                    
                      
        nS = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    23x
                    
                      
        Nmax = NmaxActive,

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    23x
                    
                      
        NmaxControl = NmaxControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    23x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    23x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    23x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    23x
                    
                      
        weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    23x
                    
                      
        parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    23x
                    
                      
        weightsS = weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    23x
                    
                      
        thetaT = tT

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    23x
                    
                      
      )$result

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    23x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(interim_qU > phiFu, FALSE, decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    23x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    92x
                    
                      
    index_look <- index_look + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    92x
                    
                      
    size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
  # The criteria for Decision 2 for Futility looks are :

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      
  # Final GO = P( RR > p0 + delta ) > tT

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
  # Final STOP = P( RR < p1 - delta ) > tF

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    52x
                    
                      
  if (is.na(decision)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    29x
                    
                      
    size_look <- nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    29x
                    
                      
    xActive <- response[which(isActive[1:size_look])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    29x
                    
                      
    xControl <- response[which(!isActive[1:size_look])]

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    29x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    29x
                    
                      
      final_eff_qU <- postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    29x
                    
                      
        x = sum(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    29x
                    
                      
        n = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    29x
                    
                      
        xS = sum(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    29x
                    
                      
        nS = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    29x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    29x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    29x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    29x
                    
                      
        parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    29x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(final_eff_qU > tT, TRUE, decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
