                    29x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    29x
                    
                      
    if (size_look %in% nnF) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    29x
                    
                      
      final_fu_qU <- 1 - postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    29x
                    
                      
        x = sum(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    29x
                    
                      
        n = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    29x
                    
                      
        xS = sum(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    29x
                    
                      
        nS = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    29x
                    
                      
        delta = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    29x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    29x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    29x
                    
                      
        parS = parS

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    29x
                    
                      
      decision <- ifelse(final_fu_qU > tF, FALSE, decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    29x
                    
                      
      all_looks <- orig_nnr[index_look]

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    52x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    52x
                    
                      
    nActive = length(xActive),

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    52x
                    
                      
    nControl = length(xControl),

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    52x
                    
                      
    decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    52x
                    
                      
    all_looks = all_looks,

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    52x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = length(xActive) + length(xControl)

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculate operating characteristics for RCT against SOC,

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    
                    
                      
#' using the predictive probability method with beta priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      
#' We emulate a randomized-controlled trial setting where at any given sample size,

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
#' there exists the number of patients enrolled in either standard of care (SOC) or control arm, and

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    
                    
                      
#' a treatment or experimental arm. The allocation of patients will depend on the

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      
#' randomization ratio set by the user and is rounded to the next higher integer.

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    
                    
                      
#' Therefore the sequence of patients is determined from the start, such that the number of

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    
                    
                      
#' patients in both arms is constant across trial simulations, however the number of patients

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    
                    
                      
#' within the control and treatment arm is determined by the randomisation ratio.

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    
                    
                      
#' Interim looks are for sample sizes below that of the final sample size.

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    
                    
                      
#' Final looks are only performed at the maximum sample size.

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    
                    
                      
#' At each interim or final look, a futility or efficacy or both can be performed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    
                    
                      
#' The rules for Stop, Go and Gray Zone (where applicable), and use of beta priors are the same

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    
                    
                      
#' as in [ocPredprobDist()] where the only difference here is to emulate a

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    
                    
                      
#' randomized-controlled trial setting.

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    
                    
                      
#' The returned value is a list with the following elements:

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    
                    
                      
#' - `oc`: matrix with operating characteristics with the following details:

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `ExpectedN`: expected number of patients in the trials in both treatment and SOC group

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `ExpectedNactive` : the mean of the number of patients in treatment arm

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `ExpectedNcontrol`: the mean of the number of patients in control arm

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `PrStopEarly`: probability to stop the trial early (before reaching the maximum sample size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `PrEarlyEff`: probability of Early Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `PrEarlyFut`: probability of Early Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `PrEfficacy`: probability of Go decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `PrFutility`: probability of Stop decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `PrGrayZone`: probability of Evaluate or "Gray Zone" decision (between Go and Stop)

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    
                    
                      
#' - `Decision` : results in `logical` with `TRUE` as Go, `FALSE` as Stop and `NA` as Evaluate decision.

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    
                    
                      
#' - `SampleSize` : numeric of sample sizes from `nnE` or `nnF` or both.

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    
                    
                      
#' - `SampleSizeActive` : numeric of sample sizes in the treatment or experimental arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    
                    
                      
#' - `SampleSizeControl` : numeric of sample sizes in either standard of care (SOC) or control arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    
                    
                      
#' - `union_nn` : unique `nnE` and `nnF` looks.

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    
                    
                      
#' - `wiggled_nnE` : user input for `nnE` with random distance applied.

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    
                    
                      
#' - `wiggled_nnF` : user input for `nnF` with random distance applied.

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    
                    
                      
#' - `wiggled_dist` : magnitude of random distance applied in order of input looks.

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    
                    
                      
#' - `params` : all user input arguments.

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    340
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_decision_one_predprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    341
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_decision_two_predprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    342
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ocPredprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    343
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams ocRctPostprobDist

                    		
                  

                  

                    344
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/ocRctPredprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    345
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    346
                    
                    
                      
ocRctPredprobDist <- function(nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    347
                    
                    
                      
                              pE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    348
                    
                    
                      
                              pS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    349
                    
                    
                      
                              deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    350
                    
                    
                      
                              deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    351
                    
                    
                      
                              phiL = 1 - phiFu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    352
                    
                    
                      
                              phiFu = 1 - phiL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    353
                    
                    
                      
                              phiU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    354
                    
                    
                      
                              relativeDelta = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    355
                    
                    
                      
                              tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    356
                    
                    
                      
                              tF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    357
                    
                    
                      
                              parE = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    358
                    
                    
                      
                              parS = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    359
                    
                    
                      
                              weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    360
                    
                    
                      
                              weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    361
                    
                    
                      
                              randRatio = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    362
                    
                    
                      
                              sim,

                    		
                  

                  

                    363
                    
                    
                      
                              wiggle = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    364
                    
                    
                      
                              nnF = nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    365
                    
                    
                      
                              decision1 = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    366
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnE, min.len = 1, lower = 1, upper = max(nnE), any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    367
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_number(sim, lower = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    368
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(wiggle)

                    		
                  

                  

                    369
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(nnF, min.len = 0, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    370
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(decision1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    371
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    372
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (sim < 50000) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    373
                    6x
                    
                      
    warning("Advise to use sim >= 50000 to achieve convergence")

                    		
                  

                  

                    374
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    375
                    6x
                    
                      
  decision <- all_sizes <- all_looks <- nActive <- nControl <- vector(length = sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    376
                    6x
                    
                      
  nnE <- sort(nnE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    377
                    6x
                    
                      
  nnF <- sort(nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    378
                    6x
                    
                      
  nnr <- sort(unique(c(nnF, nnE)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    379
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    380
                    6x
                    
                      
  Nstart <- nnr[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    381
                    6x
                    
                      
  Nmax <- max(nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    382
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    383
                    6x
                    
                      
  for (k in seq_len(sim)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    384
                    300x
                    
                      
    if (length(nnr) != 1 && wiggle) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    385
                    50x
                    
                      
      dist <- h_get_distance(nn = nnr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    386
                    50x
                    
                      
      nnr <- h_get_looks(dist = dist, nnE = nnE, nnF = nnF)

                    		
                  

                  

                    387
                    50x
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnr$nnrE

                    		
                  

                  

                    388
                    50x
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnr$nnrF

                    		
                  

                  

                    389
                    50x
                    
                      
      orig_nnE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    390
                    50x
                    
                      
      orig_nnF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    391
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    392
                    250x
                    
                      
      nnrE <- nnE

                    		
                  

                  

                    393
                    250x
                    
                      
      nnrF <- nnF

                    		
                  

                  

                    394
                    250x
                    
                      
      dist <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    395
                    250x
                    
                      
      orig_nnE <- nnrE

                    		
                  

                  

                    396
                    250x
                    
                      
      orig_nnF <- nnrF

                    		
                  

                  

                    397
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    398
                    300x
                    
                      
    nnr <- unique(c(nnrE, nnrF))

                    		
                  

                  

                    399
                    300x
                    
                      
    orig_nnr <- unique(sort(c(orig_nnE, orig_nnF)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    400
                    300x
                    
                      
    tmp <- if (decision1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    401
                    250x
                    
                      
      h_decision_one_RctpredprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    402
                    250x
                    
                      
        nnr = nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    403
                    250x
                    
                      
        nnE = nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    404
                    250x
                    
                      
        nnF = nnF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    405
                    250x
                    
                      
        pE = pE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    406
                    250x
                    
                      
        pS = pS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    407
                    250x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    408
                    250x
                    
                      
        parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    409
                    250x
                    
                      
        tT = tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    410
                    250x
                    
                      
        phiU = phiU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    411
                    250x
                    
                      
        phiL = phiL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    412
                    250x
                    
                      
        deltaE = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    413
                    250x
                    
                      
        deltaF = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    414
                    250x
                    
                      
        weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    415
                    250x
                    
                      
        weightsS = weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    416
                    250x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    417
                    250x
                    
                      
        randRatio = randRatio,

                    		
                  

                  

                    418
                    250x
                    
                      
        orig_nnr = orig_nnr

                    		
                  

                  

                    419
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    420
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    421
                    50x
                    
                      
      h_decision_two_RctpredprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    422
                    50x
                    
                      
        nnr = nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    423
                    50x
                    
                      
        nnE = nnE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    424
                    50x
                    
                      
        nnF = nnF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    425
                    50x
                    
                      
        pE = pE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    426
                    50x
                    
                      
        pS = pS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    427
                    50x
                    
                      
        parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    428
                    50x
                    
                      
        parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    429
                    50x
                    
                      
        tT = tT,

                    		
                  

                  

                    430
                    50x
                    
                      
        tF = tF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    431
                    50x
                    
                      
        phiU = phiU,

                    		
                  

                  

                    432
                    50x
                    
                      
        phiFu = phiFu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    433
                    50x
                    
                      
        deltaE = deltaE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    434
                    50x
                    
                      
        deltaF = deltaF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    435
                    50x
                    
                      
        weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    436
                    50x
                    
                      
        weightsS = weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    437
                    50x
                    
                      
        relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    438
                    50x
                    
                      
        randRatio = randRatio,

                    		
                  

                  

                    439
                    50x
                    
                      
        orig_nnr = orig_nnr

                    		
                  

                  

                    440
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    441
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    442
                    300x
                    
                      
    decision[k] <- tmp$decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    443
                    300x
                    
                      
    all_sizes[k] <- tmp$all_sizes

                    		
                  

                  

                    444
                    300x
                    
                      
    nActive[k] <- tmp$nActive

                    		
                  

                  

                    445
                    300x
                    
                      
    nControl[k] <- tmp$nControl

                    		
                  

                  

                    446
                    300x
                    
                      
    all_looks[k] <- tmp$all_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    447
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    448
                    6x
                    
                      
  oc <- h_get_oc_rct(

                    		
                  

                  

                    449
                    6x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    450
                    6x
                    
                      
    Nmax = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    451
                    6x
                    
                      
    nActive = nActive,

                    		
                  

                  

                    452
                    6x
                    
                      
    nControl = nControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    453
                    6x
                    
                      
    decision = decision

                    		
                  

                  

                    454
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    455
                    6x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    456
                    6x
                    
                      
    oc = oc,

                    		
                  

                  

                    457
                    6x
                    
                      
    Decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    458
                    6x
                    
                      
    Looks = all_looks,

                    		
                  

                  

                    459
                    6x
                    
                      
    SampleSize = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    460
                    6x
                    
                      
    SampleSizeActive = nActive,

                    		
                  

                  

                    461
                    6x
                    
                      
    SampleSizeControl = nControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    462
                    6x
                    
                      
    union_nn = nnr,

                    		
                  

                  

                    463
                    6x
                    
                      
    wiggled_nnE = nnrE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    464
                    6x
                    
                      
    wiggled_nnF = nnrF,

                    		
                  

                  

                    465
                    6x
                    
                      
    wiggle_dist = dist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    466
                    6x
                    
                      
    params = as.list(match.call(expand.dots = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    467
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    468
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' The Posterior Beta Mixture Integrand when `delta` is relative

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' The helper function to generate Integrand function when `relativeDelta = TRUE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed delta : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'  margin by which the response rate in the treatment group should

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'  be better than in the standard of care or control or `S` group.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'  Note that this can also be negative, e.g. when non-inferiority is being assessed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed p_s : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'  probability of success or response rate of standard of care or control or `S` group.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed activeBetamixPost : list

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'  a list of posterior parameters of a beta-mixture-binomial distribution with generic names

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'  `par` and `weights`. See [h_getBetamixPost()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed controlBetamixPost : list

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'  a list of posterior parameters of a beta-mixture-binomial distribution with generic names

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'  `par` and `weights`. See [h_getBetamixPost()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Function that is an argument for [stats::integrate()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
h_integrand_relDelta <- function(p_s, delta, activeBetamixPost, controlBetamixPost) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    1040236x
                    
                      
  cdf <- postprob(

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    1040236x
                    
                      
    x = 0, # Needed for Vectorize()

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    1040236x
                    
                      
    p = (1 - p_s) * delta + p_s,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    1040236x
                    
                      
    betamixPost = activeBetamixPost

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    1040236x
                    
                      
  pdf <- with(

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    1040236x
                    
                      
    controlBetamixPost,

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    1040236x
                    
                      
    dbetaMix(x = p_s, par = par, weights = weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    1040236x
                    
                      
  cdf * pdf

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' The Posterior Beta Mixture Integrand when Delta is absolute

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' The helper function to generate Integrand function when `relativeDelta = FALSE`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' a default setting.

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_integrand_relDelta

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Function that is an argument for [stats::integrate()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
h_integrand <- function(p_s, delta, activeBetamixPost, controlBetamixPost) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    751427x
                    
                      
  cdf <- postprob(

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    751427x
                    
                      
    x = 0, # Needed for Vectorize()

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    751427x
                    
                      
    p = p_s + delta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    751427x
                    
                      
    betamixPost = activeBetamixPost

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    751427x
                    
                      
  pdf <- with(

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    751427x
                    
                      
    controlBetamixPost,

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    751427x
                    
                      
    dbetaMix(x = p_s, par = par, weights = weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    751427x
                    
                      
  cdf * pdf

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' Generating bounds for the Integration of Beta Mixture Posterior

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' Using the quantile of the Beta Mixture Distribution from parameters given by standard of care `S` or

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' experimental group `E` to determine bounds as inputs to [stats::integrate()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_integrand_relDelta

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Integrand function

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
h_get_bounds <- function(controlBetamixPost) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    513717x
                    
                      
  epsilon <- .Machine$double.xmin

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    513717x
                    
                      
  with(

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    513717x
                    
                      
    controlBetamixPost,

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    513717x
                    
                      
    qbetaMix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    513717x
                    
                      
      p = c(epsilon, 1 - epsilon),

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    513717x
                    
                      
      par = par,

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    513717x
                    
                      
      weights = weights

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' Compute the Posterior Probability with Beta Prior on standard of care `S`

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' Using the approach by Thall and Simon (Biometrics, 1994), this evaluates the

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' posterior probability of achieving superior response rate in the treatment group `E`

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' compared to standard of care `S`. See note below for two formulations of the difference in response rates.

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_integrand_relDelta

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed x : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of success counts in the `E` group.

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed n : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of patients in the `E` group.

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed xS : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of success counts in the `S` group.

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed nS : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of patients in the `S` group.

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed relativeDelta : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#'  If `TRUE`, then a `relativeDelta` is used. Represents that a minimum

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#'  response rate in magnitude of `delta` of the `S` non-responding patients

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#'  is included as the margin between treatment and control group. See note.

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed parE : "`numeric` or `matrix`"

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#'  parameters for beta distribution. If it is a matrix, it needs to have 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#'  and each row corresponds to each component of a beta-mixture distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#'  for the `E` group. See details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed weights : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#'  the non-negative mixture weights of the beta mixture prior for group `E`. See details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed parS : "`numeric` or `matrix`"

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#'  parameters for beta distribution. If it is a matrix, it needs to have 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#'  and each row corresponds to each component of a beta-mixture distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'  for the `S` group. See details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed weightsS : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#'  the non-negative mixture weights of the beta mixture prior for group `S`. See details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The posterior probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' @note

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#' ## Delta :

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' The desired improvement is denoted as `delta`. There are two options in using `delta`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' The absolute case when `relativeDelta = FALSE` and relative as when `relativeDelta = TRUE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' 1. The absolute case is when we define an absolute delta, greater than `P_S`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' the response rate of the standard of care or control or `S` group such that

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' the posterior is `Pr(P_E > P_S + delta | data)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' 2. In the relative case, we suppose that the treatment group's

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#' response rate is assumed to be greater than `P_S + (1-P_S) * delta` such that

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#' the posterior is `Pr(P_E > P_S + (1 - P_S) * delta | data)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#' The beta mixture prior for the `E` arm requires argument `parE` and `weights`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#' The beta mixture prior for the `S` arm requires argument `parS` and `weightsS`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#' See [postprob()] for details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' If a beta-mixture is used, by default, the weights are uniform across the components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#' Weights can exceed 1, to which the algorithm will normalize the weights such that all weights sum to 1.

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/postprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
postprobDist <- function(x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
                         n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
                         xS = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
                         nS = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
                         delta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
                         relativeDelta = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
                         parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
                         weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
                         parS = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
                         weightsS) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    513719x
                    
                      
  if (is.vector(parE)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    2534x
                    
                      
    assert_true(identical(length(parE), 2L))

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    2534x
                    
                      
    parE <- t(parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    513719x
                    
                      
  if (is.vector(parS)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    2534x
                    
                      
    assert_true(identical(length(parS), 2L))

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    2534x
                    
                      
    parS <- t(parS)

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    513719x
                    
                      
  if (missing(weights)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    2217x
                    
                      
    weights <- rep(1, nrow(parE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    513719x
                    
                      
  if (missing(weightsS)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    2217x
                    
                      
    weightsS <- rep(1, nrow(parS))

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    513719x
                    
                      
  assert_number(n, lower = min(x), finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    513718x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(x, lower = 0, upper = n, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    513718x
                    
                      
  assert_number(nS, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    513717x
                    
                      
  assert_number(xS, lower = 0, upper = nS, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    513717x
                    
                      
  assert_number(delta, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    513717x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(relativeDelta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    513717x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(weights, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    513717x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(weightsS, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    513717x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parE, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    513717x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parS, lower = 0, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    513717x
                    
                      
  activeBetamixPost <- lapply(x, function(x) h_getBetamixPost(x = x, n = n, par = parE, weights = weights))

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    513717x
                    
                      
  controlBetamixPost <- h_getBetamixPost(x = xS, n = nS, par = parS, weights = weightsS)

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    513717x
                    
                      
  if (relativeDelta) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    281862x
                    
                      
    epsilon <- .Machine$double.xmin

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    281862x
                    
                      
    integrand <- h_integrand_relDelta

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    231855x
                    
                      
    epsilon <- .Machine$double.xmin

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    231855x
                    
                      
    integrand <- h_integrand

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    513717x
                    
                      
  bounds <- h_get_bounds(controlBetamixPost = controlBetamixPost)

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    513717x
                    
                      
  integral_results <- lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    513717x
                    
                      
    seq_along(x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    513717x
                    
                      
    function(i, this_posterior = activeBetamixPost, input_x = x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    513823x
                    
                      
      intRes <- integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    513823x
                    
                      
        f = integrand,

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    513823x
                    
                      
        lower = max(bounds[1], ifelse(relativeDelta, 0, 0 - delta)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    513823x
                    
                      
        upper = min(ifelse(relativeDelta, 1, 1 - delta), bounds[2]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    513823x
                    
                      
        delta = delta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    513823x
                    
                      
        activeBetamixPost = this_posterior[[i]],

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    513823x
                    
                      
        controlBetamixPost = controlBetamixPost

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    513823x
                    
                      
      if (intRes$message == "OK") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    513823x
                    
                      
        intRes$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    !
                    
                      
        warning("Integration failed for posterior based on x =", input_x[i], "\n", intRes$message)

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    513717x
                    
                      
        NA_real_

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    513717x
                    
                      
  unlist(integral_results)

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot a summary plot corresponding to the sumTable output

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' This function will return a plot showing a curve of the prob of a meaningful improvement over estunated diff

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' and a curve of the prob of a poor improvement over estunated diff

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data the output object of \code{\link{sumTable}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param Pos_cut a cut off for the prob of a meaningful improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param Neg_cut a cut off for the prob of a poor improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @return the \code{data} item which was imputed to the function

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom graphics lines abline polygon plot par grid mtext box axis

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
