#' @example examples/plotDecision.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
plotDecision <- function(data, Pos_cut, Neg_cut) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    !
                    
                      
  xticks <- seq(from = -50, to = 100, by = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    !
                    
                      
  x <- as.numeric(data[1, ]) # number of response;

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    !
                    
                      
  x.mode <- as.numeric(data[3, ]) # the response diff mode

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    !
                    
                      
  y <- as.numeric(data[6, ]) # The Prob of a meaningful improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    !
                    
                      
  z <- as.numeric(data[7, ]) # The Prob of a not meaningful improvement

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
  # Look up decision area;

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    !
                    
                      
  ShadeData <- t(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    !
                    
                      
  colnames(ShadeData)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  # Green area;

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
  G_area <- ShadeData[ShadeData[, "prob.go [%]"] > Pos_cut, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
  # Red ares;

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    !
                    
                      
  R_area <- ShadeData[ShadeData[, "prob.nogo [%]"] > Neg_cut, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::par(mar = c(5, 4, 4, 1) + .1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::plot(x.mode, y,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    !
                    
                      
    type = "n", xlim = range(x.mode), bty = "n", ylab = "Probability (%)", xaxt = "n", xaxs = "i", yaxs = "i",

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    !
                    
                      
    xlab = expression(paste("Estimated diff.", sep = "")), ylim = c(0, 100), panel.first = grid()

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  # find the interaction;

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  # Green area;

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
  aboveG <- ShadeData[, "prob.go [%]"] > Pos_cut

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  # Red ares;

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
  aboveR <- ShadeData[, "prob.nogo [%]"] > Neg_cut

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  # Points always intersect when above=TRUE, then FALSE or reverse

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
  intersect.pointsG <- which(diff(aboveG) != 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
  intersect.pointsR <- which(diff(aboveR) != 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  # Find the slopes for each line segment.

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
  x1.slopesG <- (ShadeData[intersect.pointsG + 1, "prob.go [%]"] - ShadeData[intersect.pointsG, "prob.go [%]"]) /

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
    (ShadeData[intersect.pointsG + 1, "mode [%]"] - ShadeData[intersect.pointsG, "mode [%]"])

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    !
                    
                      
  x1.slopesR <- (ShadeData[intersect.pointsR + 1, "prob.nogo [%]"] - ShadeData[intersect.pointsR, "prob.nogo [%]"]) /

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
    (ShadeData[intersect.pointsR + 1, "mode [%]"] - ShadeData[intersect.pointsR, "mode [%]"])

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    !
                    
                      
  x2.slopes <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  # Find the intersection for each segment.

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    !
                    
                      
  x.pointsG <- ShadeData[intersect.pointsG, "mode [%]"] +

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
    ((Pos_cut - ShadeData[intersect.pointsG, "prob.go [%]"]) / (x1.slopesG))

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    !
                    
                      
  y.pointsG <- Pos_cut

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
  x.pointsR <- ShadeData[intersect.pointsR, "mode [%]"] +

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
    ((Neg_cut - ShadeData[intersect.pointsR, "prob.nogo [%]"]) / (x1.slopesR))

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
  y.pointsR <- Neg_cut

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::polygon(c(R_area[, "mode [%]"], x.pointsR, x.pointsR, rev(R_area[, "mode [%]"])),

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
    c(rep(0, dim(R_area)[1] + 1), y.pointsR, rev(R_area[, "prob.nogo [%]"])),

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
    col = "red"

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::mtext(

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
    paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
      "Est. Diff=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
      round(x.pointsR),

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
      "%, Prob.nogo=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
      round(y.pointsR),

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
      "%",

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
      sep = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
    side = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
    line = 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::polygon(

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
    c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
      x.pointsG, G_area[, "mode [%]"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
      rev(G_area[, "mode [%]"]), x.pointsG

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
    c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
      rep(0, dim(G_area)[1] + 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    !
                    
                      
      rev(G_area[, "prob.go [%]"]), y.pointsG

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    !
                    
                      
    col = "green"

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
  ) # meaningful part;

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::mtext(

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    !
                    
                      
    paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    !
                    
                      
      "Est. Diff=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
      round(x.pointsG),

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
      "%,Prob. go=",

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
      round(y.pointsG),

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
      "%",

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
      sep = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
    side = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
    line = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::lines(x.mode, y, col = "green", lwd = 3, type = "l") # Plot PDF of beta(R,NR);

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::lines(x.mode, z, col = "red", lwd = 3, type = "l")

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    !
                    
                      
  if (Pos_cut == Neg_cut) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    !
                    
                      
    graphics::abline(h = Pos_cut, col = "black", lwd = 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::box()

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
  LablePoint2 <- unique(sort(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
    ceiling(min(x.mode) * 10) / 10,

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    !
                    
                      
    xticks, floor(max(x.mode) * 10) / 10

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
  ))) ## Can be modified

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
  graphics::axis(1, at = LablePoint2, labels = paste(LablePoint2, "%", sep = ""), las = 1, lwd = 2, cex.axis = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
  data

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Helper function for simulation result as input for `plotOc()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_oc

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed all_looks : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' original looks before adjustment by `wiggle = TRUE`, if applied.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' Different to `all_sizes` which is after the adjustment, if made.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data frame or tibble with the following variables :

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `decision` : decision `flag` with `TRUE` for Go, `FALSE` for Stop, `NA` for Gray zone.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `look` : resulting number of look size, anything below maximum

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   look size is an indicated interim, Futility or Efficacy or both.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'  - `prop` : proportion of responders by `decision` and `look`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
h_get_dataframe_oc <- function(decision, all_sizes, all_looks) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    10x
                    
                      
  df <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    10x
                    
                      
    decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    10x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    10x
                    
                      
    all_looks = all_looks # original looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
  # summarise into frequency table

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    10x
                    
                      
  df <- df |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    10x
                    
                      
    dplyr::group_by(decision, all_looks) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    10x
                    
                      
    dplyr::summarise(prop = sum(length(decision)) / nrow(df)) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    10x
                    
                      
    tibble::as_tibble()

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  # setting levels of factors

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    10x
                    
                      
  decision_levels <- c(TRUE, FALSE, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    10x
                    
                      
  look_levels <- unique(sort(all_looks))

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    10x
                    
                      
  df$decision <- factor(df$decision, levels = decision_levels)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    10x
                    
                      
  df$look <- factor(df$all_looks, levels = look_levels)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    10x
                    
                      
  df <- df |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    10x
                    
                      
    tidyr::complete(decision, all_looks, fill = list(prop = 0))

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    10x
                    
                      
  df

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' Display the operating characteristics results using an `oc` object

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' Plots results from simulated results of :

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' - `[ocPostprob()]`

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' - `[ocPostprobDist()]`

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' - `[ocPostpred()]`

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' - `[ocPostpredDist()]`

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' - `[ocRctPostprobDist()]`

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' - `[ocRctPredprobDist()]`

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_get_dataframe_oc

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed wiggle_status : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' from `wiggle` flag in object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' @return ggplot object

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/plotOc.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom ggplot2 geom_bar ggtitle

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
plotOc <- function(decision, all_sizes, all_looks, wiggle_status) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    4x
                    
                      
  assert_logical(decision)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    4x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(all_sizes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    4x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(all_looks)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    4x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(wiggle_status)

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    4x
                    
                      
  df <- h_get_dataframe_oc(

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    4x
                    
                      
    decision = decision,

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    4x
                    
                      
    all_sizes = all_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    4x
                    
                      
    all_looks = all_looks

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    4x
                    
                      
  barplot <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    4x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::ggplot(df, ggplot2::aes(fill = decision, x = look, y = prop)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    4x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::geom_bar(position = "dodge", stat = "identity") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    4x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::ggtitle(

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    4x
                    
                      
      "Results from simulation : \nProportion of Go/Stop/Grey zone decisions per interim/final analysis"

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
    ) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    4x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::theme(title = ggplot2::element_text(size = 13)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    4x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::ylab("percentage") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    4x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::theme(axis.text.x = ggplot2::element_text(size = 12)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    4x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::xlab("look (n)") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    4x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::scale_fill_manual(

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    4x
                    
                      
      values = c("#009E73", "#FF0046", "lightgrey"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    4x
                    
                      
      labels = c("Go", "Stop", "Grey zone")

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
    ) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    4x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::labs(fill = "Decision")

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    4x
                    
                      
  generic_title <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    4x
                    
                      
    "Results from simulation : \nProportion of Go/Stop/Grey zone decisions per interim/final analysis"

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    4x
                    
                      
  wiggle_warning_footnote <- paste("\nNote that sample sizes may differ slightly from the ones labeled")

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (wiggle_status) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    4x
                    
                      
    barplot +

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    4x
                    
                      
      ggplot2::ggtitle(label = generic_title) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    4x
                    
                      
      ggplot2::labs(caption = wiggle_warning_footnote) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    4x
                    
                      
      ggplot2::theme(plot.caption = ggplot2::element_text(hjust = 0, size = 10))

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
    barplot +

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
      ggplot2::ggtitle(generic_title)

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' The Difference between Two Beta Distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' The Probability Density Function of the difference of two Beta Distributions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' Density, distribution function and quantile function for

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' the distribution of the difference of two Beta distributions with parameters `parX` and `parY`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' We denote `X` and `Y` as two random variables representing the response rate of Control and Treatment

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' group respectively. The assignment of Control and Treatment is practically interchangeable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' We denote `Z` as the difference between two groups such that `Z = Y-X`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed z : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'  vector of differences between Control and Treatment arms such that `Z = Y-X`

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed parX : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'  two parameters of `X`'s Beta distribution (Control)

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed parY : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'  two parameters of `Y`'s Beta distribution (Treatment)

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed eps : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'  lowest floating point number as lower bound of integration

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed rel.tol : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'  used in [stats::integrate()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The density values

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @note `X` and `Y` can be either Control or Treatment and `Z = X-Y`, subject to assumptions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats dbeta integrate

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname dbetadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/dbetadiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
dbetadiff <- function(z, parY, parX, eps = .Machine$double.eps, rel.tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    666x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(z, min.len = 1, finite = TRUE, any.missing = TRUE, null.ok = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    666x
                    
                      
  ret <- z

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    666x
                    
                      
  is_z_pos <- z >= 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    666x
                    
                      
  is_z_neg <- z < 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    666x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parY, len = 2, lower = .Machine$double.xmin, any.missing = FALSE, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    666x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parX, len = 2, lower = .Machine$double.xmin, any.missing = FALSE, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    666x
                    
                      
  assert_number(eps, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    666x
                    
                      
  integrandPos <- function(x, zval) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    9580x
                    
                      
    exp(

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    9580x
                    
                      
      stats::dbeta(x = x, parX[1], parX[2], log = TRUE) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
        # x + zval = y, if z = y - x

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    9580x
                    
                      
        stats::dbeta(x = x + zval, parY[1], parY[2], log = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    666x
                    
                      
  integrandNeg <- function(y, zval) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    25055x
                    
                      
    exp(

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    25055x
                    
                      
      stats::dbeta(x = y, parY[1], parY[2], log = TRUE) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
        # y - zval = x, if  z = y - x

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    25055x
                    
                      
        stats::dbeta(x = y - zval, parX[1], parX[2], log = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    666x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_along(z)[is_z_pos]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
    # integrate over x, when z is positive

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    4959x
                    
                      
    ret[i] <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    4959x
                    
                      
      f = integrandPos,

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
      # We transform the bounds to follow the support of integrandPos here.

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    4959x
                    
                      
      lower = eps,

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
      # The upper bounds here are between 0 and 1.

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    4959x
                    
                      
      upper = 1 - z[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    4959x
                    
                      
      zval = z[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    4959x
                    
                      
      subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    4959x
                    
                      
      rel.tol = rel.tol

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    4959x
                    
                      
    )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    665x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_along(z)[is_z_neg]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
    # integrate over y, when z is negative

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    9625x
                    
                      
    ret[i] <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    9625x
                    
                      
      f = integrandNeg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
      # We transform the bounds to follow the support of integrandNeg.

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    9625x
                    
                      
      lower = eps,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
      # The upper bounds here are between 0 and 1.

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    9625x
                    
                      
      upper = 1 + z[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    9625x
                    
                      
      zval = z[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    9625x
                    
                      
      subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    9625x
                    
                      
      rel.tol = rel.tol

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    9625x
                    
                      
    )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    665x
                    
                      
  ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta difference Cumulative Probability Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the Cumulative Probability Function of the Beta difference for a given probability.

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed q : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#'  vector of quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The probability distribution value

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats integrate

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pbetadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/pbetadiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
pbetadiff <- function(q, parY, parX, rel.tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    174x
                    
                      
  stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    174x
                    
                      
    f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    174x
                    
                      
    parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    174x
                    
                      
    parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    174x
                    
                      
    lower = -1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    174x
                    
                      
    upper = q,

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    174x
                    
                      
    subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    174x
                    
                      
    rel.tol = rel.tol

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    174x
                    
                      
  )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' Beta difference Quantile Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculates the quantile of the Beta difference for a given probability.

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed p : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#'  vector of probabilities

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The quantile values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats uniroot

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname qbetadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/qbetadiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
qbetadiff <- function(p, parY, parX, eps = .Machine$double.eps) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    12x
                    
                      
  target <- function(q) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    169x
                    
                      
    pbetadiff(

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    169x
                    
                      
      q = q,

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    169x
                    
                      
      parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    169x
                    
                      
      parX = parX

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    169x
                    
                      
    ) - p

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    12x
                    
                      
  eps <- 1e-10

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    12x
                    
                      
  stats::uniroot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    12x
                    
                      
    f = target,

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    12x
                    
                      
    interval = c(-1 + eps, 1 - eps)

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    12x
                    
                      
  )$root

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot the Beta distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' This function will plot a PDF of a beta distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed alpha : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'  first parameter of the Beta distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed beta : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'  second parameter of the Beta distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A beta distribution density plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom graphics axis

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/plotBeta.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
plotBeta <- function(alpha, beta) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_number(alpha, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_number(beta, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    1x
                    
                      
  x_support <- seq(from = 0, to = 1, length = 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    1x
                    
                      
  data <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    1x
                    
                      
    grid = x_support,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    1x
                    
                      
    xticks = seq(from = 0, to = 1, by = 0.25),

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    1x
                    
                      
    density = dbeta(x_support, alpha, beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    1x
                    
                      
  ggplot2::ggplot(data) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    1x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::geom_line(ggplot2::aes(x = grid, y = density)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    1x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::ggtitle(paste("Beta density with alpha =", alpha, "and beta =", beta, "parameters.")) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    1x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::xlab("response rate") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    1x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::ylab(quote(f(x))) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    1x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::theme(axis.ticks.x = ggplot2::element_line(linewidth = 0.5)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    1x
                    
                      
    ggplot2::scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::percent_format())

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot difference Between two Beta distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' This function will plot the PDF of a difference between two Beta distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed parX : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'  non-negative parameters of the control Beta distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed parY : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'  non-negative parameters of the treatment Beta distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed go_cut : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'  a meaningful improvement threshold, the lower boundary of a meaningfully improvement in response rate

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed stop_cut : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'  a poor improvement threshold, the upper boundary of a meaningfully poor improvement in response rate

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed shade : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'  paint the two areas under the curve, default value = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed note : flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'  show values of the colored area, default value = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a ggplot object

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/plotBetaDiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom ggplot2 geom_line ggtitle geom_area

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats integrate

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords graphics

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
plotBetaDiff <- function(parX, # parameters of control or SOC

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
                         parY, # parameters of experimental arm

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
                         go_cut = 0.20, # a meaningful improvement threshold

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
                         stop_cut = 0.1, # a poor improvement threshold

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
                         shade = TRUE, # paint the two areas under the curve

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
                         note = TRUE) { # show values of the colored area

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    2x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parX, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    2x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parY, lower = 0, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    2x
                    
                      
  assert_number(go_cut, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    2x
