  assert_number(x, lower = 0, upper = Nmax)

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    1522x
                    
                      
  assert_number(n, lower = 0, upper = Nmax)

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    1522x
                    
                      
  assert_number(xS, lower = 0, upper = NmaxControl)

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    1522x
                    
                      
  assert_number(nS, lower = 0, upper = NmaxControl)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    1522x
                    
                      
  assert_number(Nmax, lower = x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    1522x
                    
                      
  assert_number(NmaxControl, lower = xS)

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    1522x
                    
                      
  assert_number(thetaT, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    1522x
                    
                      
  mS <- NmaxControl - nS

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    1522x
                    
                      
  mE <- Nmax - n

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    1522x
                    
                      
  assert_number(xS + mS, lower = 0, upper = NmaxControl)

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    1522x
                    
                      
  assert_number(x + mE, lower = 0, upper = Nmax)

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    1522x
                    
                      
  controlBetamixPost <- h_getBetamixPost(

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    1522x
                    
                      
    x = xS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    1522x
                    
                      
    n = nS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    1522x
                    
                      
    par = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    1522x
                    
                      
    weights = weightsS

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    1522x
                    
                      
  density_z <- with(

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    1522x
                    
                      
    controlBetamixPost,

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    1522x
                    
                      
    dbetabinomMix(x = 0:mS, m = mS, par = par, weights = weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    1522x
                    
                      
  activeBetamixPost <- h_getBetamixPost(x = x, n = n, par = parE, weights = weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    1522x
                    
                      
  density_y <- with(

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    1522x
                    
                      
    activeBetamixPost,

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    1522x
                    
                      
    dbetabinomMix(x = 0:mE, m = mE, par = par, weights = weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
  # determine resulting posterior probabilities:

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    1522x
                    
                      
  outcomesY <- x + c(0:mE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    1522x
                    
                      
  outcomesZ <- xS + c(0:mS)

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    1522x
                    
                      
  density_yz <- posterior_yz <- matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    1522x
                    
                      
    nrow = 1 + mE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    1522x
                    
                      
    ncol = 1 + mS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    1522x
                    
                      
    dimnames =

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    1522x
                    
                      
      list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    1522x
                    
                      
        0:mE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    1522x
                    
                      
        0:mS

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    1522x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_along(outcomesY)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    24171x
                    
                      
    for (j in seq_along(outcomesZ)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    511174x
                    
                      
      posterior_yz[i, j] <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    511174x
                    
                      
        postprobDist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    511174x
                    
                      
          x = outcomesY[i],

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    511174x
                    
                      
          n = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    511174x
                    
                      
          xS = outcomesZ[j],

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    511174x
                    
                      
          nS = NmaxControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    511174x
                    
                      
          delta = delta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    511174x
                    
                      
          relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    511174x
                    
                      
          parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    511174x
                    
                      
          weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    511174x
                    
                      
          parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    511174x
                    
                      
          weightsS = weightsS

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    511174x
                    
                      
      density_yz[i, j] <- density_y[i] * density_z[j] # check each

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    1522x
                    
                      
  ret <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    1522x
                    
                      
    result = sum(density_yz * (posterior_yz > thetaT)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    1522x
                    
                      
    table = data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    1522x
                    
                      
      counts = c(0:mE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    1522x
                    
                      
      cumul_counts = x + (0:mE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    1522x
                    
                      
    density = density_yz,

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    1522x
                    
                      
    posterior = posterior_yz,

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    1522x
                    
                      
    success = (posterior_yz > thetaT)

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    1522x
                    
                      
  ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#' Compute the predictive probability that the trial will be

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#' successful, with a prior distribution on the standard of care or `S`

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
#' Compute the predictive probability of trial success given current data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#' Success means that at the end of the trial the posterior probability is:

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#' `Pr(P_E > P_S + delta_0 | data) >= thetaT`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
#' Where `P_E` is the response rate of the treatment or `E`group and

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
#' `P_S` is the response rate of the standard of care of `S` group.

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
#' Then the predictive probability for success is:

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
#' `pp = sum over i: Pr(Y = i | x , n)*I{Pr(P_E > P_S + delta | x,Y=i) >= thetaT}`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
#' where `Y` is the number of future responses in the treatment group and `x` is

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#' the current number of responses in the treatment group out of `n`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#' Please see note in [postprobDist()] for definition of `delta` and `relativeDelta`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior is `P_E ~ beta(a, b)` and uniform is a `beta(1,1)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
#' However, a beta mixture prior can also be specified. Analogously

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
#' for `P_S` either a uniform beta prior or a beta mixture prior can be

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
#' specified.

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
#' Also data on the `S` might be available. Then the predictive probability is

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
#' more generally defined as :

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
#' `pp = sum over i, j: Pr(Y = i | x, n)*Pr(Z = j | xS, nS )*I{Pr(P_E > P_S + delta | x,xS, Y=i, Z=j ) >= thetaT}`

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
#' where `Z` is the future number of responses in the `S` group, and `xS` is the

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
#' current number of responses in the `S` group.

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
#' In the case where `NmaxControl = 0`, a table with the following contents will be included in the return output :

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
#' - `counts`: `Y = i`, number of future successes in `Nmax-n` subjects in ascending order.

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
#' - `cumul_counts`: `Y = i`, number of future successes in `Nmax-n` subjects.

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
#' - `density`: `Pr(Y = i|x)` using beta-(mixture)-binomial distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
#' - `posterior`: `Pr(P_E > P_S + delta | x, Y = i)` using beta posterior.

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
#' - `success`: indicator `I( b > thetaT )`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
#' If `NmaxControl` is not zero, i.e., when data on the control treatment

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
#' is available in this trial, then a list with the following contents will be included in the return output :

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
#' - `counts`: `Y = i`, number of future successes in `Nmax-n` subjects in ascending order.

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
#' - `cumul_counts`: `Y = i`, number of future successes in `Nmax-n` subjects.

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
#' - `density`: `Pr(Y = i|x)` using beta-(mixture)-binomial distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
#' - `posterior`: `Pr(P_E > P_S + delta | x, Y = i)` using beta posterior.

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
#' - `success`: indicator `I( b > thetaT )`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams h_predprobdist

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A `list` is returned with names `result` for predictive probability including or separately a

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
#'  `table` of numeric values with counts of responses in the remaining patients, `density` for

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
#'  probabilities of these counts, `posterior` for corresponding probabilities to be above threshold,

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
#'  and `success`for trial success indicators.

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
#' @references Lee, J. J., & Liu, D. D. (2008). A predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      
#' design for phase II cancer clinical trials. Clinical Trials, 5(2),

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
#' 93-106. doi:10.1177/1740774508089279

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/predprobDist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
predprobDist <- function(x, n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      
                         xS = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
                         nS = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
                         Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
                         NmaxControl = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
                         delta = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      
                         relativeDelta = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
                         parE = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    
                    
                      
                         weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      
                         parS = c(a = 1, b = 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
                         weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
                         thetaT) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      
  # ensure reasonable numbers

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    1520x
                    
                      
  stopifnot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    1520x
                    
                      
    n <= Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    1520x
                    
                      
    nS <= NmaxControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    1520x
                    
                      
    x <= n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    1520x
                    
                      
    xS <= nS

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    1520x
                    
                      
  mE <- Nmax - n # remaining active patients

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    
                    
                      
  # if par is a vector => situation where there is only one component

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    1520x
                    
                      
  if (is.vector(parE)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    1514x
                    
                      
    stopifnot(identical(length(parE), 2L))

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    1514x
                    
                      
    parE <- t(parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    1520x
                    
                      
  if (missing(weights)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    !
                    
                      
    weights <- rep(1, nrow(parE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    
                    
                      
  # if parS is a vector => situation where there is only one component

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    1520x
                    
                      
  if (is.vector(parS)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    1516x
                    
                      
    stopifnot(identical(length(parS), 2L))

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    1516x
                    
                      
    parS <- t(parS)

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    1520x
                    
                      
  if (missing(weightsS)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    2x
                    
                      
    weightsS <- rep(1, nrow(parS))

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    1520x
                    
                      
  if (NmaxControl == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    2x
                    
                      
    ret <- h_predprobdist_single_arm(

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    2x
                    
                      
      x = x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    2x
                    
                      
      mE = mE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    2x
                    
                      
      n = n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    2x
                    
                      
      Nmax = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    2x
                    
                      
      delta = delta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    2x
                    
                      
      relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    2x
                    
                      
      parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    2x
                    
                      
      parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    2x
                    
                      
      weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    2x
                    
                      
      weightsS = weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    2x
                    
                      
      thetaT = thetaT # check what is missing here

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    1518x
                    
                      
    ret <- h_predprobdist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    1518x
                    
                      
      x = x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    1518x
                    
                      
      n = n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    1518x
                    
                      
      xS = xS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    1518x
                    
                      
      nS = nS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    1518x
                    
                      
      Nmax = Nmax,

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    1518x
                    
                      
      NmaxControl = NmaxControl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    1518x
                    
                      
      delta = delta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    1518x
                    
                      
      relativeDelta = relativeDelta,

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    1518x
                    
                      
      parE = parE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    1518x
                    
                      
      parS = parS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    1518x
                    
                      
      weights = weights,

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    1518x
                    
                      
      weightsS = weightsS,

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    1518x
                    
                      
      thetaT = thetaT

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    1520x
                    
                      
  ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Mode and Credible Interval Calculation for The Difference between Two Beta Distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' A function to summarize the characters of a betadiff distribution [dbetadiff()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' May require use of random sample generator to calculate, use [set.seed()] to reproduce results.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams dbetadiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams plotBetaDiff

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed ci_level : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   level for credible interval

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @return List with the mode, credible interval for the difference,

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' along with the `go` and `stop` probabilities.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats optimize integrate

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/sumbetadiff.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
sumBetaDiff <- function(parX, # Treatment group's parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
                        parY, # Control group's parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
                        ci_level = 0.9,

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
                        go_cut,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
                        stop_cut) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parY, len = 2, lower = .Machine$double.xmin, any.missing = FALSE, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(parX, len = 2, lower = .Machine$double.xmin, any.missing = FALSE, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(ci_level, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(go_cut, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_number(stop_cut, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    5x
                    
                      
  result <- try(

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    5x
                    
                      
      mode <- stats::optimize(

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    5x
                    
                      
        f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    5x
                    
                      
        interval = c(-0.999, 0.999),

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    5x
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    5x
                    
                      
        parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    5x
                    
                      
        maximum = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    5x
                    
                      
      )$maximum

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    5x
                    
                      
      lower <- qbetadiff( # to recover x when F(x) is at lower percentile

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    5x
                    
                      
        p = (1 - ci_level) / 2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    5x
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    5x
                    
                      
        parX = parX

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    5x
                    
                      
      upper <- qbetadiff( # to recover x when F(x) is at upper percentile

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    5x
                    
                      
        p = (1 + ci_level) / 2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    5x
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    5x
                    
                      
        parX = parX

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
      # Prob for Go:

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    5x
                    
                      
      prob_go <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    5x
                    
                      
        f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    5x
                    
                      
        parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    5x
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    5x
                    
                      
        lower = go_cut,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    5x
                    
                      
        upper = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    5x
                    
                      
        subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    5x
                    
                      
        rel.tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.1

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    5x
                    
                      
      )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
      # Prob for Stop:

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    5x
                    
                      
      prob_stop <- stats::integrate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    5x
                    
                      
        f = dbetadiff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    5x
                    
                      
        parX = parX,

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    5x
                    
                      
        parY = parY,

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    5x
                    
                      
        lower = -1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    5x
                    
                      
        upper = stop_cut,

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    5x
                    
                      
        subdivisions = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    5x
                    
                      
        rel.tol = .Machine$double.eps^0.1

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    5x
                    
                      
      )$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    5x
                    
                      
      list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    5x
                    
                      
        mode = mode,

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    5x
                    
                      
        ci = c(lower, upper),

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    5x
                    
                      
        go = prob_go,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    5x
                    
                      
        stop = prob_stop

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    5x
                    
                      
    silent = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
  # if there were any errors, fall back to Monte Carlo estimation

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    5x
                    
                      
  if (inherits(result, "try-error")) { # try-error is a class

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
    samples <- stats::rbeta(n = 2e6, parY[1], parY[2]) -

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
      rbeta(n = 2e6, parX[1], parX[2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
    lower <- stats::quantile(samples, prob = (1 - ci_level) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
    upper <- stats::quantile(samples, prob = (1 + ci_level) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
    prob_go <- mean(samples > go_cut)

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
    prob_stop <- mean(samples < stop_cut)

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
    samples <- cut(samples, breaks = seq(from = -1, to = 1, length = 801))

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
    samples <- table(samples)

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
    mode <- seq(from = -1, to = 1, by = 0.0025)[which.max(samples)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
    result <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    !
                    
                      
      mode = mode,

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
      ci = c(lower, upper),

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    !
                    
                      
      go = prob_go,

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
      stop = prob_stop

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    5x
                    
                      
  result

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Predictive probability of trial success

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Compute the predictive probability of trial success given current data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' Success means that at the end of the trial the posterior probability is

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' `Pr(P_E > p) >= thetaT`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' where `p` is the fixed response rate threshold and `P_E` is the response rate in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' treatment group or `E` group.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' Then the predictive probability for success is:

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' `pp = sum over i: Pr(Y=i|x,n)*I{Pr(P_E > p|x,Y=i)>=thetaT}`

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' where `Y` is the number of future responses in the treatment group and `x` is

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' the current number of responses in the treatment group out of n.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' The prior for the response rate in the experimental arm is `P_E ~ beta(a, b)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' A table with the following contents will be included in the return output :

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' - `counts`: `Y = i`, number of future successes in `Nmax-n` subjects.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' - `density`: `Pr(Y = i|x)` using beta-(mixture)-binomial distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' - `posterior`: `Pr(P_E > p | x, Y=i)` using beta posterior.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' - `success`: indicator `I(b > thetaT)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed x : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of successes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed n : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'  number of patients.

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed Nmax : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'  maximum number of patients at the end of the trial in the `E` group.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed p : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'  threshold on the response rate.

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed thetaT : number

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'  threshold on the probability to be above p.

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed parE : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'  the beta parameters matrix, with K rows and 2 columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'  corresponding to the beta parameters of the K components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @typed weights : numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'  the mixture weights of the beta mixture prior.

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A `list` is returned with names `result` for predictive probability and

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'  `table` of numeric values with counts of responses in the remaining patients,

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'  probabilities of these counts, corresponding probabilities to be above threshold,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'  and trial success indicators.

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @references Lee, J. J., & Liu, D. D. (2008). A predictive probability

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'  design for phase II cancer clinical trials. Clinical Trials, 5(2),

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'  93-106. doi:10.1177/1740774508089279

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @example examples/predprob.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
predprob <- function(x, n, Nmax, p, thetaT, parE = c(1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
                     weights) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
  # m = Nmax - n future observations

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    1806x
                    
                      
  m <- Nmax - n

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    1806x
                    
                      
  if (is.vector(parE)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    1782x
                    
                      
    assert_true(identical(length(parE), 2L))

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
    # and transpose to matrix with one row

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    1782x
                    
                      
    parE <- t(parE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    1806x
                    
                      
  if (missing(weights)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    1713x
                    
                      
    weights <- rep(1, nrow(parE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1806x
                    
                      
  betamixPost <- h_getBetamixPost(x = x, n = n, par = parE, weights = weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1802x
                    
                      
  density <- with(

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1802x
                    
                      
    betamixPost,

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1802x
                    
                      
    dbetabinomMix(x = 0:m, m = m, par = par, weights = weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    1801x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(density, lower = 0, upper = 1 + .Machine$double.eps, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1801x
                    
                      
  assert_number(thetaT, lower = 0, upper = 1, finite = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  # posterior probabilities to be above threshold p

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    1800x
                    
                      
  posterior <- postprob(x = x + c(0:m), n = Nmax, p = p, parE = parE, weights = weights)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    1800x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    1800x
                    
                      
    result = sum(density * (posterior > thetaT)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    1800x
                    
                      
    table = data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    1800x
                    
                      
      counts = c(0:m),

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    1800x
                    
                      
      cumul_counts = n + (0:m),

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    1800x
                    
                      
      density = round(density, 4),

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    1800x
                    
                      
      posterior = posterior,

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    1800x
                    
                      
      success = (posterior > thetaT)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
}
